choices: The spoild live of living at the Foxworth.
111.content: How does Oliver become an overweight kitten?
111.title: Oliver

1111.content: Does it happen during the movie or after the movie?
1111.title: The spoild live of living at the Foxworth.

11111.content:
After a whole life of living on the streets of New Work, was getting adopted into the Foxworth family a dream come true to Oliver.

After getting inside the warm house that they live in, Jenny took him to the kitchen. In the kitchen Jenny started taking out different ingredients and started to try and make some cat-food (Because they didn’t have any at home). In her cooking she decided to put in some weight gain powder in the mix, because she thought that a live on the streets must have been pretty hard on Oliver’s body.

When Jenny had finished her homemade cat-food, she took one of Georgettes finest bowl and poured it on. Oliver became a bit unsure. The food was a grey mass with little bits that looked like dog food. He hadn’t been having a real meal in a long time, but was he so desperate that he would be eating this?

“This looks like something I would find under a garbage can.” Oliver thought. “But if I don’t eat it she might kick me out.” And with that Oliver dived his head into the bowl and started eating.

How does Oliver think it tastes?
11111.title: During.

111111.content:
Oliver couldn’t believe it. It tasted better then anything he had eaten before. His little careful bites went to enormous mouthfuls. He even sometimes swallowed without chewing. Finally he finished his eating by licking the bowl clean. He then laid on his back rubbing his belly. By then his stomach had expanded to almost three times its original size.

“Did you like that?” Jenny asked. Oliver answered with a nod, followed by a (big for a kitten) burp. This made Oliver blush a little. “So much?” Jenny said and giggled a little at Oliver´s burp. “In that case I have to remember the recipe so I can make it again.”

“Yes!” Oliver thought. “It was the best food I ever eat.”

What happens next?
111111.title: Amazing.

1111111.content:
A night of sleeping did wonders for Oliver´s stomach pains from overeating. Another thing the sleeping had done was to transfer all the fat and calories from Oliver´s belly to the other parts of his body.

His whole frame was a little wider and rounder. He had still a bit of a belly hanging, and the start of an double chin.

He found it difficult to get out of his basket because of his new body structure. But after some tries he got up rolling from laying on his back to on his stomach, and heave himself up.

He walked to Jenny´s bed finding that his walks style I different to. They are more wider and longer, and his body shakes a little of doing them. When he reaches her bad he tries to jump up to her. But he doesn’t reach the edge of the bed and land on his fatted rump. He tries to wake her up by yelling like cat do. And it works.

“God morning Oliver.” Jenny says while rubbing her eyes a little. “Do you need some breakfast?” she asks. Oliver gives her a little nod in response. “Then I’ll help you make some.” She said and walked down to the kitchen.

As she went down the stairs Oliver followed her. But found it a bit more difficult to do all these little jumps down, because his bigger belly seemed to be getting in the way all the time.

In the kitchen Jenny started to take ingredients and started cooking.

How will the cooking go?
1111111.title: Skip to next day.

11111112.content:
While she remembered how to make it taste just like before, she didn’t remember how much weight gain powder she had to pour in. So she took some, and then some more just to be safe. She had actually double the dose of weigh gain powder.

Making this didn’t take so long because she didn’t needed to heat up anything. After a minute so was she finished.

It was almost at the same time when Oliver had finally made it down all the stairs. For him it felt like he had run a mile, so his stomach demanded some food. Now!

Jenny poured the mix into another of Georgettes food bowls and served Oliver. Remembering how wonderful it tasted last time Oliver downed down and started eating it like crazy. He took his time more this time and could enjoy the flavours more. He gave his teeth and tongue some work to do this time. Last time he´d just filled his mouth and swallowed the food. This time he took his time to taste, chew taste some more, and finally swallow.

He had understood now that being a pet he was going to be able to eat this delicious food how much he wanted. With that in mind he still made sure to eat up every little bit this time to. He even made sure to lick the bowl clean when he was finished.

After eating he felt strange. The extra weight gain powder didn’t make him feel as full like last time, but more heavy like he had a big cement block in his belly. Even Jenny thought that Oliver felt a lot heavier when she was helping Oliver back to his basket in her room. A soon as Oliver was back in his basket he feel asleep to let his food digest.

How much had Oliver gained the next day?
11111112.title: Something is different.

111111122.content:
Even if 10 pounds didn’t sounds like much, for a little kitten it is almost like 20 pounds for a human. Totally so far had Oliver gained 15 pounds. Making him a bit chubby for a kitten.

Oliver liked his new body though. He felt so warm and cuddly. If every meal he gets is making him gain so much it wont be long before he´s obese or even immobile, but Oliver was prepared to be that. If he could still be lying in a comfortable bed, in a warmed up room, with all the food he can eat, he wouldn’t care if he would never be able to move a muscle again.

After dreaming about his future self Oliver took the time to take a look at his new body. He saw that his previous equally wide form now had a bulge in the midsection. It was his belly. It stood out 2 inches and looked he had swallowed a tennis ball.

When he was stretching his paws over to feel his belly, he saw the next change of his body. His arms and legs were thicker and heavier. He rested his front paws on his stomach, and felt how his paws sunk in a little. He liked how that felt.

Last he felt that he was breading a little heavier then before. He took and reached his arms to feel his throat. He could feel the same touch of fat that he had feel on his stomach. Bending down his head to try and see, Oliver felt something stopping him. it was a second chin.

Still Oliver welcomed his changes, and was hopping to be a bigger kitten after his next meal.

What kind of meal would Jenny give him next?
111111122.title: 10 pounds.

choices: Eat a lot of the healthy food.
Try to make his own unhealthy food.
1111111222.content:
As Oliver was heading down to the kitchen he was eager to get his next meal. He had decided to become a gainer, and not stop until he wasn’t able to reach for any food on his own.

He started to feel that something was wrong when he didn’t see Jenny cooking anything. She just took a bag from the self and pored into a smaller then usual bowl some strange looking things. They where small and dry and hard. Jenny thought that Oliver looked like he had had more then enough of fattening meals and should get ordinary cat food.

Oliver decided to at least give the new food a chance before complaining. But it didn’t take long before he missed the old fat food. These things where so small that he barley could feel satisfied after eating all of them he got served. While the old food where mostly like a thick liquid with some little hard bits, these were all completely hard things that required much of his jaws muscles to handle. Finally it was dry, so dry. It was so dry that Jenny had put a water bowl just to help him rinse his throat.

After finishing it all he felt like he had only been eating almost half the amount of food he from his first meal here. He had after only two meals of Jenny´s homemade cooking been addicted to only eat meals that would make him fat.

So what should he do to achieve his goal?
1111111222.title: A boring chapter.

choices: Someone seeing what he was doing.
11111112222.content:
“If Jenny wasn’t going to make any of that homemade food, then I will make it myself.” Oliver thought while he was eating the last of the healthy food that Jenny had given him.

The same night he decided to set his plan in action. Luckily for him Jenny leaves the bedroom door open for him if he needed to move around during the night. After having no problems getting to the kitchen.

Now comes the more tricky part. With just his bare paws he would have to take and lift, move and open things to be able to make his meal. His final plan was to take and put a bowl on the floor, and then rollover food packages and let the ingredients pour down into the bowl.

He started with jumping up to the counter. Even if he was a bit chubby he was still able to jump like usual. He happens to find a big cooking bowl standing on the counter. He then took the bowl and pushed it into the sink under the water tap. He took and turned on the tap and let the bowl get filled to the brim.

Next Oliver found the ingredients for the dish after opened a cupboard. The things that would give the dish the taste and the fat were in powder form. All he had to do was to tip them over and let the powder pour into the water filled bowl.

While the box with the powder to give taste poured out enough the one with the fat didn’t. It just didn’t stop coming. Even Oliver thought that it was enough and tried to make it stop to no avail. It seems like fat even in powder form was heavier. When Oliver finally was able to rise the box straight again almost half of the powder in it had fall into the bowl.

While looking at the mix that was starting to come together to the same mixture that Jenny had made Oliver suddenly felt like he heard something.

What was it?
11111112222.title: Try to make his own unhealthy food.

111111122222.content:
When he realised that no one was coming to save him Oliver started to get a little panic. He started to swim like crazy and make some loud noises. Doing that made some food going in to the big opened mouth of the cat. Not thinking of what to do Oliver swallowed the food, and realized just how to get out of this situation.

He started to take large bits of food and swallow to make the level sink. And with the more food he eats, the quicker he became to swallow the next portions. He could feel how his stomach got bigger and more stretched as time went on.

Oliver had only been eaten half of the big feast before he started to feel a pain of being full in his belly. He could also feel his feet touching the bottom of the bowl. He could quit here, sleep the night and get pick up by Jenny the next day. But he was bestämd to finish this challenge he had been given himself. The challenge to eat every little bit of the food that he had made.

So he continued to eat. He eat so much that he was lying on the bottom of the bowl with no more food left. Or almost no more food left. There was some bits that was on the walls of the bowl that Oliver had missed. Speaking of Oliver he looked full. Really, really full. Lying on his back he saw that his previously chubby belly had grown to a mini mountain. It was three times wider and two times higher. He must have been eating at least 20 pounds of food, and with the weight gaining powder it would probably lead to 10 more pounds

But he still didn’t feel satisfied. The where still some chunks of food hanging on the walls. And he was going to eat everything. He started were he could, which was the bottom walls around him. It was just like eating a mouthful, but there were bigger portions higher up. With the walls cleaned Oliver could finally get a grip with his claws, and used then to help heaving him up. When he had lifted himself up enough he took and tried standing on his hind legs. Surprisingly it worked. All the extra weight in the bottom half of him made him stand up like a Tjock på boten docka. With easy little steps he made his way to the higher placed food. During his eating he could feel his stomach giving massive protests. Ignoring his huge pains Oliver finished the very last piece of food in the entire bowl.

After doing so Oliver felt back on his back again, squirming and massaging his stomach. He seriously felt like he was on bite from exploding. But it was worth it. Jenny could do everything she wanted to him now. She could put him on diets, make him exercise, or even throw him out of the house. He didn’t care. He felt like he had done everything you could do in life. “So bring you´re best Jenny! I can take it!” Oliver thought. He felt asleep afterwards.

A couple of hours later Jenny woke up felling hungry. She walked down to the kitchen getting a little shock. She saw several boxes opened, and trace of the ingredients on the kitchen table leading to the kitchen sink. Looking down she saw a food bowl with a very stuffed Oliver. Oliver actually woke up of the sounds of Jenny being in the room. The big confidence that he had before going to sleep was gone now when saw Jenny eye to eye. He had no idea if she was going to punish him or not.

What was she going to do?
111111122222.title: Nothing.

1111112.content:
A phone call.

“Jenny! You got a phone call from your parents!” Winston´s voice shouted to Jenny.

“My parents! I haven’t heard from them all day!” Jenny said and left the room.

While Oliver was lying on floor trying to contain all the food he had eaten, he hears someone coming in the room.

Who is it?
1111112.title: Something happens.

11111121.content: the pampered poodle walked and looked at oliver. "hi georgette, how are you?" he asked. georgette didnt answer, she just stared at oliver, he looked so..
11111121.title: big cat.

they run into jenny near her room
111111211.content:
Georgette looks at the stuffed oliver and smiles, "Georgette: Mmmmmmm... you look like big old plump turky *licking her lips and spining oliver around with her paw* you make me so hungry.

Oliver soon stops spining and was now faceing a hungry looking georgette, "oliver: please miss georgette... dont eat me!"

then georgette got a idea in her head and looked at the cat food and other foods in the room and thinks on how she torture the cat by stuffing him up with alot of food and soon gets the food and back to oliver who gulps in fear

"georgette: i hope you like eating! *starts to stuff the little kitten with food*

about 30-40 mins later oliver was now the size of a beanbag chair and smiles evil smiles, "Georgette: now you are going to be my new bed/chair! *evil laughs and rolls him to her room*

What should happen next?
111111211.title: tasty.

111111212.content: Did she thought that he looked cute, or did she thought that the sight of the fat kitten was just disgusting?
111111212.title: Other emotion?

choices: Give you a nice tummy rub and licking tickle!
Make you even fatter than you already are!
1111112121.content:
Georgette opened her eyes widely, and a huge, excited smile appeared upon her face. Oliver was a bit confused at first, but he quickly understood what her sudden change of mood was about when she exclaimed: "OLIVER! You're SOOOOOOOOO kay-ute!" She licked his face and nestled her own face into his soft, fat tummy, and also tickled both that and his sides, causing Oliver to burst into laughter. "Hey, hahahahahahahahahahahahaha, stop it, Georgette! Hahahahahahahahahaha! I'm ticklish! Especially on my tummy! Ha, ha, ha, ha, ha, ha, ha! Knock it off! Cut it out! Hahahahahahahahahahaha!" Soon she'd tickled him so much that tears were coming from his eyes, but then she stopped and picked him up, going: "Oh, my, I can't believe I was annoyed at you being here at first. You're so adorable, and even if you were before, you're even more so now by quite a lot! Just like you weigh more by quite a lot, too!" She held him close and hugged him tight, then Oliver couldn't help but start to purr as he closed his eyes contentedly. Not only was that fattening food Jenny gave him good, but it had made Georgette love him instead of seeing him as an intruder. He was now like a priceless, one of a kind treasure to her, and he could tell he was most definitely going to like this new life of his, even if it also meant he was going to be something of a tubby tabby and corpulent kitten from now on, especially since, if one meal made him this large, he knew he was only going to continue gaining weight until he couldn't move at all.

Georgette stroked him down the back many a time and let her face get lost in his flabby paunch, and Oliver hugged her face and purred soothingly and serenely. After a bit of it, Georgette was done and placed Oliver, who was disappointed that such a heavenly embrace had to end, back down, making sure he would be placed on all four feet, or the closest thing he could get to it with his new gut.

"I know, Oliver!" he then heard Georgette say, seeing a look on her face which clearly signified she'd come up with a marvelous new idea. His own face lit up as he became excited and eager to hear what he knew was something she meant to say that he anticipated. Looking into his happy eyes, she then told him: "I think that this is the perfect time for me to..."
1111112121.title: Georgette's New Plaything

choices: Georgette starts molding Oliver into a fat little kitty version of herself
Later, the gang find him again...after Georgette has 'already' molded him
Oliver proves to kindhearted to become anything like Georgette.
11111121212.content:
"Really?" Asked the little round ball of fur "Are you sure?"

Georgette tittered like she'd been told the worlds funniest joke "Sure? My sweet little kitty cat, 'I' am never unsure about anything." She pulled him closer and waved about the massive room "Look at it dear. Luxury as far as the eye can see. Nothing for us but sheer, unmitigated indulgence for as long as we desire. Your not like those common tabbies anymore. Digging through trash for fish bones. Pouncing on birds.....'working' for a living catching mice for humans in some vain hope they will feed you...." Her lips pulled back in disgust at the 'W' word. "Here in this place. Your use to the humans in merely to grace them with your presence. The mere act of existing and letting them care for you is your sole job. Why, you could grow so fat that you couldn't move. So fat that you stomach lifts your paws off the marble, and when you can't reach your food, they will bring the food to you."

"Mmmmm." The kitten looked thoughtful.

"All you need to do my dear, is look adorable. And I must say, your doing a good job of that." She tickled his side, causing him to pull back with a laugh "All you need is...a 'few' changes here and there, and you'll be living the high life for the 'rest' of your life. Just like yours truly."

"Changes?" He asked slowly as the dog circled behind him. Pushing her nose against his back to wordlessly say she wanted him to move.

"Of course. Your just naturally so cute it shouldn't take much. But a little styling here, the right conditioner there. Some filing on your claws, the right tooth whitener. Why you'll have even the butler talking to you like a newborn no matter how fat you grow." She grinned. Holding her head high as she thought of everything she would help Oliver with. Everything she would teach him about proper attitude. Proper behaviour and he grew larger and larger "I'll teach you everything I know about how one should hold themselves. How to speak to others. How to make what you want clear to the humans. Oh it will be fabulous. We'll be the best of friends."

"If your sure."

"As I said my dear. I'm never unsure about anything."
11111121212.title: Make you even fatter than you already are!

choices: Have Jenny make you a nice, rich, breakfast in bed tomorrow morning!
Let you sleep in bed with me tonight!
1111112122.content:
Georgette could not believe what she was seeing. "A portly, foul creature like this in the house of a perfect girl like me? And a rich girl like Jenny?" Georgette thought. "And in the body of a CAT, of all things? What Jenny fed him, I've no clue, but in any case, I can't believe what I'm looking upon." She then snarled: "You listen here, you tubby little runt..." Oliver gulped in fear at the sudden hostility, especially with such a vulnerable position as he was in. He was on his back, bloated belly fully exposed, and unable to move much due to how full he was, after all. "It's annoying enough I have to deal with sharing a house with you to begin with, since I don't like attention being diverted from me to you, and that you are a cat makes it worse, at least for a perfected poodle like myself. But for you to bloat up like a balloon after eating some of MY food that Jenny just happened to give you for how she took you in? You make me want to puke! I can't believe I'm even looking at you, much less talking to you! You don't even deserve that, not even in the form of condemning like this! You are a disgrace to this house and if you have any respect for me, Jenny and/or Winston at all, you will leave the instant you can move again and never so much as look back in the direction of this mansion again! And who knows? Maybe you'll make a nice, plump snack for the vicious street dogs out there! I only wish I could hear you scream and die when it happens!" Georgette said all of this in an extremely coarse, bitter and nasty tone, which one might expect to hear from the hosts of hell, and her cutting words also were reminiscent of what hell's demonic occupants would say to someone. Oliver was so frightened, his feelings so hurt, that he not only went white(or as white as he could go, given his orange and yellow fur), but he literally vomited up the rich, special food Jenny had given him. All of it, to the point where he was almost as thin as he had been before eating it, and the difference was so subtle, even eagle eyes would have difficulty seeing it. He also, realizing he could move again and felt empty, ran into the corner and stayed backed against it, tears coming out of his petrified eyes as he looked terrified beyond belief, and felt equally trapped. He was also trembling with trepidation, thinking Georgette was going to either kill him, throw him out or do something equally awful. He'd never felt this cornered, this afraid or this hurt.

Georgette, having previously been consumed by her disgust at the sight of the up until a few seconds ago fattened kitten, now realized just how cutting, cruel and vicious she'd been when she lashed out at him, and couldn't help but feel a little pity towards how helpless and scared he looked. Her conscience and the heart she had deep down despite all her vices and quirks made her see that this was just an innocent kitten who was hungry and happened to have eaten a lot because of it and she'd now scared him so badly he'd puked his meal up and looked nearly identical to the way he had before. Her angry eyes turned to concerned, caring ones and she walked over, nuzzled Oliver, who quickly saw she was trying to comfort him, to his surprise, and she said: "I'm so sorry, little one. I didn't mean to frighten you. I shouldn't have been so nasty. You were just in need of some food and had a big meal, and now I made you literally lose your lunch because of the way it made you look after you'd eaten. Yeah, it's annoying to have Jenny pay attention to you along with me, instead of just me, but I should know better than to condemn you like this. I should be more fair to you." Oliver increasingly realized how sorry Georgette was and how sincere she was about it, and that he didn't need to be afraid. He rapidly began to calm down and soon hugged Georgette's muzzle. As soon as he was back to his normal, cheerful self, Georgette said: "You deserve something nice from me after all you've been through, right down to the inexcusable way I treated you just now, so to atone for it and make you feel more welcome here, why don't I..."
1111112122.title: Georgette Is Appalled At Such A Sight

1111222.content: Oliver was asleep in is bed, his large body lays still accept for the rise and fall of his long breathes. Georgette was disgusted by how fat he had gotten as she prodded his rump with her paw only to see it jiggle back into place, leaving Oliver undisturbed.
1111222.title: obese

11112221.content:
Georgette pressed his fat again and again, she was actually starting to enjoy it. suddenly, an idea came "I can feed him and make him fatter." Georgette thought as she then dashed downstairs to prepare his first meal.

Oliver woke to the smell of cooked food. He heaved himself up and gave his body a shake, this caused his entire body to jiggle before heading downstairs toward the smell. As he entered the kitchen, he was shocked to find that georgette was cooking breakfast. "Good morning Oliver, I made breakfast." Oliver was surprised that Georgette could cook let alone make all his favorites. "This is all for you." Georgette said as Oliver became suspicious. "Why?" Oliver said as his eyes narrowed. "To be honest, I was poking at your fat earlier and I realized that I actually like your fat body, so I decided to be your feeder and make you fatter. What do you think?" Georgette said with a smile. "Wow, I think that's a great idea, I'd love to get fatter for you" Oliver said as he jiggled his large rump in front of a mirror. In truth, Oliver was in love with his fat body and the idea of getting fatter only made the love greater. "Ok, let's dig in." Oliver said as he shoved the food into his mouth.

Georgette could only watch as Oliver expanded before her, getting fatter with each bite. "Oliver, this is going to be the beginning of a beautiful friendship." Georgette sais as she assisted in the stuffing.
11112221.title: georgette the feeder

111122212.content:
A week had past and Oliver's weight had skyrocketed. His body now jiggled with even the slightest movement, he now began to get stuck in cat doors, his belly was now always touching the floor. He also had a few rolls on his think legs as well as some extra chins, his rump was now taller then his head, his belly was dragging on the floor, he was even having difficulty walking long distances, and he loved every second of it. He loved the heaviness and how his body flowed as his fat jiggles with each step. He loved the warmth that his body gave as well as the sound of the floor creaking under his weight.

Oliver entered the kitchen where Georgette stood waiting. "there you are, time to check your weight tubby." Georgette said as she pulled out a scale and had Oliver step on it. "Wow, a hundred pounds! that's amazing." Georgette said as she went to get Oliver's next fattening meal.
111122212.title: Oliver the feedee

1111222122.content: Georgette soon returned with a dozen tubs of high-fat vanilla ice cream. "it's feeding time little piggy." Georgette sais as she began spoon feeding him while rubbing his belly. "is it good?" Georgette asked as she continued to knead his fat body. "it tastes great." Oliver said as he began to stuff his face into the tubs.
1111222122.title: frosted fatty

He was now an obese blob of a kitten with mane folds forming on his thick legs and layers upon layers of fat on his body as he now stood at twice georgette's size. "More, I want more, I need to be fatter." Oliver said as he felt around his flabby body.

choices: Send Oliver away in a package.
Trick him to enter a bus that was going far away.
11112222.content:
She absolutely hated everything about that cat.

Ever since he was once found by Jenny and got moved into living under the same roof as her, to how after she managed to get rid of him he had already charmed Jenny enough so that she and unfortunately Georgette had to get out on a dangerous mission to return him. And since then Jenny had been carrying and feeding him so much that he had now become this smaller blob of a cat. And the most irritating thing about it is that Jenny still loves him. Even though he is fat and lazy and all around disgusting to be near (For Georgette at least) Jenny couldn't stop showing her love to him. Georgette felt so much hate (and a little jealousy) towards him.

All she really wanted to do was to find a way to get rid of him again, and this time not having him come back.

And as she planning as best she saw something that got her inspiration.
11112222.title: she hates it

111122221.content:
Looking into Jenny's room Georgettes spotted something that gave her an idea.

Jenny had been talking to her pets about a friend she had in england that she kept in contact with through letters. For some time they had both been thinking about sending more then words to each others, and that's when Jenny had got her own little idea. With the help of a big box Jenny was planning to send some american candies, and comics and other things that they didn't have in the UK, and her letter friend would do the same thing.

Looking at the box in her room Georgette saw that it was very big in size, considering she was only thinking about sending candy and comics, but that's where Georgette's idea came into place. "Why not use the extra space to pack something more?" She thought evilly to herself.

After some more thinking Georgette had made out a full grown plan. First she was going to steal some sleeping pills from a can from the medicine cabinet, then she was going to put it into some self-made food she was going to serve Oliver, once he had fallen asleep she would cary him to the box where she would then drop him in. After that everything else would be taking care of itself.

Georgette felt proud of knowing that nothing could go wrong with her plan.
111122221.title: Packaged cat.

choices: In the New York Post Office Storeroom.
1111222212.content:
At first everything was going to plans. Georgette had managed to take the pills, and had made a very good looking dish that nobody would guess had sleeping pills in it. She served it to the fat, which was just as happy to eat just about anything when something not according to the plans happened.

"Why do you serve me this?" Oliver asked. It wasn't that he asked in a suspicious way or anything, it was just the fact that he did that Georgette hadn't though about. "Because...I like you?" Georgette tried to answer convincing, while also trying to give Oliver a huge innocent looking smile. "But don't you hate me?" Oliver asked once again like a curious little kid, since that's what he was. "Yes, but...I though I should do this nice thing to you at least once." Georgette said, struggling to improvise a good answer.

Olive was about to eat the dish when he stopped and asked, "Have you done something to this food?" And this time his voice sounded a bit suspicious, much to Georgette's horror. "No,No,No Oliver dear. I would never do that. What ever made you think that I would do something like that?" Georgette answered quickly and slightly nervous. Oliver just looked at her for a moment before going back to eat it, but just like last time, right before he took his first taste of it he asked, "Don't you want to eat also?"

This got Georgette in a slight panic state. Thing is, though, that his new life also awakened something that Dodger knew about himself all along, but didn't acknowledge or pay attention to until now because he knew there was no point, for it was utterly out of the question for his previous kind of lifestyle. 1131.content:
Georgette cooed in delight atop her rooms grand dog bed as she ran her paw over her new man's vast stretch of fur.....which was quite unusual for him to have considering he was a chihuahua.

Slowly she reached over she jabbed into a piece of sirloin positively glistening with fat with her fork (no way she was going to eat mouth first like regular dogs, she was a pedigree!) and lifted it to his mouth.

"Open wide my sweet. It's time for 8ths." She batted her eyes at him.

Lost in them the 'little' dog opened up his tiny mouth just so it could be filled up by high price meat. Knowing she wasn't going to let him breath until he ate it all he gnawed furiously at the meat. Tearing and shredding it for all it was worth until he'd eaten every bite. He sighed deeply in relief before she lifted up another cut towards him.

He panted. His stomach felt full, as it tended to nowadays. He liked the feeling don't get him wrong........but he was getting kind of sick of feeling it almost the entire day with these prolonged meal time. He'd been eating for three hours now and from what he'd heard there was only more on the way.

"Can't." He said through bloated cheeks. "Too Full."

She moved back slightly as though affronted. "Full? Why nonsense my love." She said as she patted his enormous stomach "Your not even a little sated yet. You've got much more to eat before your finished." She pushed the steak cut against his mouth again forcing him to start eating. "Much, much more." She lay her head against his belly. He shifted about for a minute which she enjoyed since it felt like one of those massage beds, relaxing her greatly. She didn't know....or maybe didn't care that it was really him trying to leave.

It was a useless action anyway. Tito couldn't leave, he couldn't move at all. He was fat, hell he wasn't fat he was obese........for a much bigger dog! He looked like a furry brown beach ball, his tiny feet stuck out uselessly from his four massively thick legs. His tiny head stuck out comically from a neck wider than his skull. He looked like someone has taken a much bigger dog and shrunk his hands and feet.

Georgette had him sitting up with his forelegs in mid air while his stomach inched forward to cover his back ones, if he ever tried getting on all fours again he would have to pray his stomach lifted his legs off the ground or else their bulk would break his feet.

Yet Georgette suggested, insisted, demanded he keep getting fatter. That her living pillow grow more comfortable, more attractive to her. He learned all too late that the pampered poodle had a thing for 'big' guys. She normally wouldn't look at a male unless his stomach hung a good number of inches of him, and positively adored those whose belly's brushed the ground. She also loved nothing more than taking skinny or buff dudes (like him) and turning them into lazy lardos, which once again he learned to little to late.

With a gasp he was rolled onto his back, his entire bulk sloshing up to his minuscule head to try and make it fly off. Georgette gave him a half lidded expression before licking his nose affectionately.

“Mine.” She whispered into his ear. She got herself comfortable again and sighed in contentment before falling asleep.

Tito groaned to himself, not knowing whether to be happy that such a gorgeous señorita was cuddling him, or sad becasue she had him trapped like this.

Smiling to him Georgette says that there's no problems, and that he's welcome to enter.

Walking through the pillow towards the middle Tito can't help but think that he must be dreaming. He's going to share a pillow together with possibly on of the most beautiful women he's ever seen. Once there Georgette points to her stomach and chest area, and asks Tito to lay on top there. Not waisting a second Tito lays himself on top of her, and it feels so much more softer and warmer then the pillow. "So how does that feel?" Georgette asks, seeing that the little dog is really enjoying it. "It feels soo much more amazing that it's insane! You are the best pillow I've ever felt." "Thanks, Its really my pleasure to see you enjoying it soo much." Georgette said blushing slightly about the compliment. "I only wish that I to could get to feel the same things your feeling right now." Georgette said to Tito with a bit sadness in her voice. "Georgette my dear, If I could I would wish to make myself the best pillow you have ever seen." Tito said to comfort her. (He would regret soo much about saying that to her if he had known what that would lead to.)

Breaking the wonderful mood that they had Georgette asked if Tito was hungry. Feeling a little hungry Tito said, "Yeah, maybe a little snacks would be nice." "Well, then I think you are going to like this," Georgette said getting of the pillow, leaving Tito still laying in it. "You have gotten a chance to test my house and my pillow, now I think is the time for you to test some of my food." Georgette said, and took out a can of dog food and a spoon. Getting the tap of she put the spoon inside and scooped out a nice spoonful. "Once you have tried my meat, you wouldn't want to stop eating it at all." Georgette said, with a bit of an evil undertone in her voice.

Would Tito understand that hint?
11311.title: Flashback to when this all started

113111.content:
Not seeing anything strange about it Tito opened his mouth and let Georgette feed him. Just the share taste of it was enough to send Tito into ecstasy.

He had been eating meat before, but most of it had been sloppy greasy hotdogs, or old moldy burgers from dumpsters. It had either been raw, undercooked, overcooked, or almost non-edible moldy for this poor dog and his friends. But now he had in his mouth this wonderfully tasting treat of food. The sheer richness of it's taste and it's loose content litearlly made it melt in his mouth. Spreading himself out over the giant pillow Tito could feel how his whole body was getting much more softer and relaxed by this single spoonful. It was almost like he was in a coma like state.

Seeing the expected reaction of Tito Georgette smiled knowing that things would be going exactly as planned. "If this is how he feels after just one spoonful, then this is going to be easier then I thought." Georgette thought diabolically.

Seeing Tito getting back from his minor food coma Georgette made sure to prepare another spoonful for him. "Unh, What happen?" Tito asked feeling a bit hangover over the sudden super relaxed feeling. "Oh, I just let you taste on some of my private own dog food. Did you like it?" Georgette asked while pretending to be completely unaware of what had happen. "It was...the best thing I ever been eating." Tito said sounding a bit stoned. "Then I guess you wont stop to eat another one?" Georgette asked while trying to sound as dim as typical beauty model would sound. (This was all a part of her plan to make Tito feel like he was the one with the upperhand.)

"I guess so..." Tito said trying to understand why Georgette was actiong so weird. "Then open up and I'll feed you." Georgette said happily and started to feed Tito a second spoonful. Tasting, chewing, and swallowing the second spoonful made Tito feel this wonderful effects again, and now they felt really addicting and he wanted more of it. "Do you want more food?" Georgette was asking. "Yes, give me more food!" Tito shouted in a very numb voice. "As you wish dear." Georgette said playfully as she gave him his third spoon almost directly after his second one. The lead to the wonderful feeling inside Tito being twice as powerful, and he wanted even more of it.

He continued being feed spoon after spoon after spoon, until the whole can was emptied. "More food! Give me more food!" Tito shouted from the pillow while rubbing his slightly bulged belly. Having been getting more and more food to eat had made him think more and more that he was the man in the house now and could have whatever he wanted, and he wanted food..lots of it. Reaching inside the can Georgette found it to be empty. "FOOD!" Tito shouted. "I hear you but the can is empty. I will have to go down to the kitchen to get another one." Georgette said as she was heading out the door. "Make sure to be quick woman!" Tito shouted to her.

Getting down to the kitchen Georgette felt furious inside. "That little pup has some nerves. Just let him pretend being in charge for a moment and then he shows his true colours. But just you wait, when I'm done with you, you will regret not being nicer to me when you had the chance." Georgette thought as the grabbed a new can and headed back up. Once back she feed him the whole other can before Tito was feeling full. "Satisfied?" Georgette asked trying to really sound dreamy when asking. "Yeah, that was great. You are the best woman ever." Tito said trying badly to pretend to sound charming while rubbing his now fully bloated belly, that was about the size of Tito himself before eating.

Looking at Tito relaxing on her pillow with a potbelly of a pig Georgette had to try hard to not get tempted and eat him. "He's soo bad at hiding his true feelings that it's almost sad, but lets just see how long time it takes before he realizes that he has just been used this whole time?" Georgette think to herself.

How long would it take for Tito see that something is up?
113111.title: The start of the fatness.

choices: He tries escaping during the night.
1131112.content:
This acting of Georgette pretending to be Tito's faithful servant while feeding him constantly went on for two months.

During this time Tito was growing larger and larger by all the eating. He wasn't that big of an immobile blob like he was in the present, but his movement in his les where starting to get pretty limited. He would much more prefer sitting or laying down then standing up and having to support his body, and if he was forced to walk he would probably only get a couple of yards before getting tired.

And with his weight getting bigger so was also his ego. The fact that he had all this food to eat, and beautiful woman serving him it made him feel like he was some kind big shot of the mobster world that had everything and could get anything he wants.

For Georgette this pretending was only getting her patience more and more thin. Tito's growing arrogant attitude that he had was really putting a test on her. Sometimes she felt like she just wanted to throw the fat sack of lard that he was out on the street and leave him there, but then another thought entered her head. "He was playing the role as the dominate one of the two, but soon those roles might get reversed." she thought, and smiled by the thought of overthrowing her husband as the ruler of the house.

"Just one more feeding before telling him news" Georgette thought as she entered the bedroom where Tito was taking up a big part of it with his weight. "There you are woman!" Tito said, having to started calling Georgette nothing else but "woman" ever since his greed raised a certain level. "Yes dear?" Georgette asked with her teethes clenched, trying to keep her cool. "I'm hungry, feed me!" The very fat Tito shouted, leaving his mouth open for Georgette to put food into it. "You used to be such a loving husband, and now you're this...pig!" Georgette thought as she started to hand feed him huge pieces of meat for him to chew and swallow. "But just you wait. After this feeding you will be the one having to follow orders."

After she was done feeding him Tito had a very stuffed and bloated middle, and would be very hard to move on his own when laying on his back like he did. Now would be the right moment for Georgette. "Tito my dear?" She said nicely, trying to give him one last chance to be nice to her. "What do you want you old bat?" Tito asked nonchalant, trying to sleep after his eating. That was a mistake.

Had he paid any attention to who his wife was he would have known that under no circumstances would you ever call Georgette old! Especially not when she was about to do what she was about to do.

Going from "pretending to be nice" to "more furious then a bull seeing a red cape" Georgette dropped the act and dropped one of her paws on the recently feed Tito's belly. "Ouch!!!" Tito shouted, felling the paw press down with really powerful force onto his sensitive spot. "What are you doing?..." Tito asked wit hpain in his voice before Georgette took over the conversation with full force. "You listen here!" She shouted, "I have been nothing but nice to you and feed you and petting you and doing pretty much everything else for you, and how do you repay me? By acting like a big fat pig, just eating and slobbering all day while I do everything else in the house! And that I can live with, but I'm tired of your new attitude. Always calling me woman when you know, my, name!" (During that part she repeatedly stepped her paw on his stomach to make her point.) "But all that will change now and do you know why?" She asked him, getting a scared head shake for a "no" back from him. "Because I'm now the one in charge now, and you will from now on only say yes dear when I speak to you. Is that understood?" She asked, staring him in the eyes threateningly. Fearing what she would do Tito quickly said "Yes Dear." back to her. "Good." She said, taking her paw of his stomach.

While Tito was clutching his soar middle Georgette continue telling him the new rules. Everything from how she was still going to feed him regularly and how he now was going to have a scheme to follow for how many times a day and how much he would be consuming. How he would treat her with respect each time he talked to her if he didn't want to be forced to eat even more as punishment, and how as time goes one he would have to be prepared to take in even larger amounts of food as his body would grow.

All of this sounded like something from a nightmare to Tito. The dog he used to love so much had now gone crazy with wanting to fattening him up, and he only had himself to blame for making it end up so. Given his body he wouldn't either be able to put up much of a fight or resist her forcing the food down to him, so there wasn't much of plan to work around. "Oh, and I almost forgot." Georgette said, brining Tito out of his own thoughts. "Since it's so late right now I suggest we both have a good night sleep, and then the next day we start the first day of your new life." Georgette said before leaving the bedroom. "You can have the bed for yourself dear, it will be the last night so spend in it while being so skinny." She said jokingly, before closing the door and going downstairs to sleep on the couch.

A lot of thoughts flew around in Tito's head at the moment. "Should I try escaping the house during the night and flee? But where you I go? Think if Georgette catches me in the act and punishes me? Maybe I should just give in, and let her have her way?"

Which side of his debate wins?
1131112.title: Two Months.

choices: Georgette reads the note and goes off to find Tito.
11311121.content:
After debating for some time Tito decided to try to escape during the night as he slowly waddled past Georgette while she was sleeping, as he found a notepad and ink as he left a message for Georgette in case she woke up and noticed Tito wasn't there as he put his paw prints onto a note.

"If you have read this note by now I will have already left our home because frankly it just doesn't seem like things are working out between us. Forgive me my love but I think it's best if we go our separate ways for the time being. Signed Tito." The note read as Tito silently but sadly waddled out of Georgette's room as he slowly closed the door itself as he waddled his way towards the nearest door outside and closed it slowly as he waddled away from their house with his head hanging low as tears filed his eyes as he waddled down the sidewalks of New York's neighborhoods as a full moon was in the sky on a late yet beautiful spring night.

Now what will happen as Tito sadly waddles down the sidewalks of New York's neighborhoods and upon reading Tito's note the next day will Georgette find and punish Tito for escaping from their house or will she forgive him?

Tito´s answer was “I´m going to…

1141.content:
It had been three weeks since Sykes and his two demonic dobermans had kicked the bucket, and things had gotten a lot better since then in many ways for NYC(no surprise there, seeing as how Sykes was a real monster and so were his two attack dogs he raised to be like him). Anyway, though there were some good zeniths reached, like how Fagin was able to get a real job and an apartment to live in along with his dogs, plus their part in bringing Sykes down made it so they were vindicated from all past thefts as long as Fagin promised neither he nor any one of his dogs would ever steal again(which he promptly did and made sure his dogs did, as well). Along with how said apartment was in a building right next door to Jenny's mansion. And, of course, how Oliver had grown on Georgette and she was much nicer to him than she'd been initially, and he was glad they were at last friends, and, in a loose sense, sort of siblings, since he just wanted to be her friend from the start, being the sweet, lovable and innocent kitten he was. That, and Dodger and Rita had fallen in love, and Tito had apologized to Georgette and vice versa, reconciling their relationship.

But the biggest milestone of all? Georgette was able to admit her feelings(at least just to Oliver, anyway)of how she was really tired of always having to be perfect and keep the way she looked in check, and it was depressing to always have to look the best possible way she could and live rigidly and strictly. And winning all those 1st place awards, trophies, oooohs and aaaaaahs and the like? It was no fun anymore, especially since it had gotten to be repetitive even for her. Oliver, being as sweet, caring and understanding as he was, sympathized with the poodle and thought up the perfect idea to make things better.

"So who says you have to continue with all those shows? Your room's already filled with trophies, and they actually said on the news recently, as I heard Jenny's parents talking about, that you were an everlasting champion on those shows and deserved a free life, and thus were being allowed to drop out and always be looked at as # 1 no matter what, and regardless of how you chose to shape your future! That you helped put a stop to Sykes only added to how well deserved such a nice break for you was!" "Yes, Oliver," Georgette acknowledged, "but the problem is I don't know what to do now! The purpose I've now quit has been my purpose for years, and I know of no other ways of life! It's like I've hit a dead end, or at the very least a wall, and a high one, at that!" "Well, not anymore, because I'm going to show you just how fun it is to live softly and be able to afford such a nice life on easy street!" Oliver smiled as he winked at her. Georgette was a bit surprised, especially with how excited his tone was, but she could tell this was the best bet she was likely to get for the rest of her life, so she went along with Oliver's idea. She and her kitten pal made their way into the kitchen, and the latter said: "Okay, you've always kept yourself so thin and twiglike. And I've been thin for my whole life, to this day, even as we now both have a better one. Sure, it's for different reasons entirely, but don't you think we could both use some food and, for that matter, some weight? Especially since this kind of life doesn't require you to do much except laze around?"

Georgette, as soon as she heard this, opened her eyes widely, for the realization of what Oliver was saying hit her like the C-Train in the subway of the city she lived in. "Are you suggesting we turn ourselves into fat, inert, overly-contented, gluttonous fur blobs?" "Basically, but more along the lines of gainers. Think about all those foods you've always wanted to eat, but known you couldn't. Not to mention how I've always wondered what they're like, but never got the chance for them. Well, today, since Jenny's at school, Winston is on a trip to a wrestling match he has tickets for a seat in the audience of and both of Jenny's parents are on a business trip, that means we have the whole house to ourselves and this could be the once in a lifetime opportunity we get to eat as much junk food, gain as much weight and live as much of a soft, lazy, relaxed, happy life as we possibly can. Won't it be fun to pile on the pounds?" Oliver responded, and this last bit of his coaxing did the trick. Realizing what she wanted, and knowing how strange this felt after years of being Miss Six Times National Champion and a perfect princess of a pencil thin poodle, Georgette got herself under control and was able to deal with how weird this far cry from her former self she was going to become was, and said: "All right, Oliver, how do we make ourselves go from cadaverous to corpulent? What do we eat?" "What don't we eat? But we've got to start somewhere." Oliver answered. "Hey, I know! How about..."

114331.content:
Two weeks after Sykes and his Doberman duo had died, there was a morning in which a curse came upon Rita and Georgette, without either one or anyone else expecting it after both fell asleep the night before just like everyone else did in their respective homes.

Said curse was sudden and abrupt, and no one would know what it was, where it came from or that it even existed, for that matter, but when Georgette woke up, not only were she and Rita, in the morning, suddenly teleported into the same alley together, thanks to that curse, but that very same curse had caused them both to become unbelievably fat.

Here, I'll show you, these both being pictures made by HectorTheWolf and therefore not by me notwithstanding, how fat both of them were.

Georgette looked like this(minus the smile and the dog food remains around her, and instead looking shocked and aghast while freaking out, no duh)...

https://hectorthewolf.deviantart.com/art...

...and Rita looked like this(also minus the smile and, though alarmed and taken aback, as well, not freaking out like Georgette was)...

https://hectorthewolf.deviantart.com/art...

Both had seen each other just before discovering what had happened to them, but they discovered it before either could say a word or try and think about what might have happened to get them together in the same alley all of a sudden.

"H-H-H-HOW THE HELL DID I G-G-G-ET SO FAT???" Georgette exclaimed, barely able to keep herself together, and asked Rita: "AND HOW D-D-D-DID YOU GET THAT W-W-W-WAY, FOR THAT M-M-M-MATTER??????"

"Georgette, stop freaking out." Rita said firmly, true to tough, brave and down to earth form. "And don't have a breakdown. This is jarring beyond words, but we need to try and find a way to figure out what happened here, both concerning how we got here so suddenly and how we got this obese, neither of which have any apparent explanation."

"E-E-E-E-EASY FOR YOU T-T-T-T-TO SAY..." Georgette replied, on the verge of falling apart and becoming catatonic. "Y-Y-Y-YOU AREN'T THE ONE WHO NEEDS TO M-M-M-M-MAINTAIN HER PERFECTION E-E-E-E-EACH DAY..."

"I SAID STOP FREAKING OUT AND DON'T HAVE A BREAKDOWN!" Rita boomed, silencing Georgette and suddenly causing her losing it to cease, at least for the time being. "We have to look for a way to, A, get home, since, unless they're still asleep, our respective friends and owners are undoubtedly worried sick about us, B, look for an answer to what caused all of this and, C, do something to solve the problem and undo everything that's been done here. So the last thing we need is to make it worse."

"You're...you're right, Rita." Georgette nodded, realizing how the saluki's words were indeed accurate. "It's just...I never thought I'd see anything the least bit remotely like this even in my worst of nightmares. But yeah, going nuts isn't going to solve anything. First thing's first, though. How are we going to stand up again, and even if we do, how will we be able to move?"

"Both very good questions." Rita said. "Fortunately, I'm sufficiently smart to find a way for us to do both, though this will, fair warning, cause you to think I'm insane." Georgette nodded, and Rita continued: "We push and suck our guts in as much as possible, then we use what strength we've got left in our current conditions to thrust ourselves up and stand on our hind legs, which means we'll have to use our forelegs and forepaws as arms and hands, respectively. I know, I know. Crazy idea. But it's either that or being immobile and literally getting nowhere."

Georgette sighed, once more unable to deny how right Rita was, and then said: "Okay, are we doing this on the count of three?" Rita nodded and said: "Yes, because that's the way to do it that stands the greatest chance of success. I'll do the counting. Ready?" "Ready." Georgette said, and Rita told her: "One, two, three!"

They sucked their guts in with all their might along with using their forelegs and forepaws to push them in and hold them in(or at least do so to what they could of them, anyway)and pushed their hind legs and hindpaws up, also with as much strength as they could, and it proved just enough so that they were standing again before they had to let go of their giant bellies and let them spill out again, though thankfully they made sure to do so slowly so that they wouldn't fall over, given how much effort this all took.

"Well, what do you know? It worked!" Georgette said. "I hate to admit it, but this was a great idea, Rita, as crazy as it was." "See? What did I tell you?" Rita said, and then she told Georgette: "Okay, next of all, we can move now, but unlike how we were able to move previously, we'll be moving almost as slow as it's possible for anyone and/or anything to move. So it's going to take us quite a while to get anywhere, both figuratively and literally. In other words, keep it together. Because otherwise there'll be more problems, and I don't think you want any of those any more than I do."

"No, Rita, of course not!" Georgette confirmed. "Well, you know these streets better than I do, so lead the way." Rita informed her: "Just what I was thinking."

So they got going, and to their surprise, they discovered...
