11511.content:
Just like all the other dogs, Rita was starving. They didn't get much food to eat, and when they did they had to split it up in six parts. This started to take hard on Rita's body. She felt weaker and started almost to look like skin and bones on some places.

During walks in town she had started to see that some of the riche male dogs had started to flirt with her. She had got some panting and some barks that on dog languages mean things like ”Hey there pretty. Why don’t you hang with guys like us? “

At first she just ignored their comments. But as her hunger become bigger she started to come up with a plan. If those dogs think that she is so attractive, then she is going to use that to her advantage. Her plan was to seduce the rich dogs to share some of their food.

The next day when Fagin was out trying to sell some junk and the other dogs busy fixing food Rita saw her chance. She went alone to the rich dogs neighbourhood. She stopped at the first house on the block and started to test her plan. First she gave a whistle to get the dog’s attention. When he looked out of a window he saw Rita seducing. She gave little winks and kisses that worked better than she could ever believe. The male dog was so charmed by her flirting that he was more than eager to help her when she asked if there was some food she could have. He invited her in and shared some of his dog-food.

After having a bigger portion of food that Rita had have for a long time, she asked if she could have some in a trash bag to take with her. The dog was a bit confused why she wanted to have it in a trash bag, but if that what she wants then that’s what’s she gets.

One her way home she started to take a look on herself. She saw that all that eating showed it´s sings. Her belly had grown a bit and was wiggling a little to her movements. She just hopes that the other dogs don’t see it when she comes home.

When she returned to the Houseboat she found that the other hadn’t been so lucky finding food. So when Rita unwrapped he trash bag and showed them the food they where happy at first, Eating like crazy, Except Rita how was still felling full from her huge meal. But then Tito asked where she found it witch made all the other dogs to stop and looked at Rita wondering that to. It wasn’t just likely to find so much food. “I-I´ll was lucky. I´ll found it in a trashcan outside one of those houses in the rich district. Y-You know how wasteful the people who lives there is.” Rita said and tried to look convincing.

Luckily her friends bought it and didn’t notice that her belly was a little bigger, they where just happy to have a meal that made all of them fairly feed. This made Rita wonder if she should do it again? This way she could always be sure to get more food to eat then she could eat, and give her friends some to feed them to. The problem was for how long can she trick them to not discover the truth?

Was it worth the risks?
11511.title: By seducing other dogs to give her their meals.

115111.content:
For the next couples of days Rita took and visited all of the rich dogs in the rich block. A day could go like this. During her “Search for food” Rita took and visited one of the rich dogs, Got herself invited by charming the rich dog, Had herself a satisfying meal, and left with some food for the boys to.

To make sure the other dogs in her gang didn’t get to suspicious she made sure to vary which dog she visits. Because they all have different dog-food, and after eating she varied the size of the food she brought back to make it look more like a it was something she could have find in a dumpster. “Sometimes I´m more lucky” was her explanation to her friends.

All this access of getting free food was starting to make Rita’s fantasy go wild. Usually she had just gone to one dog a day and have a dissent meal. But her mind had have dreams of trying to eat beyond her limits. To get a chance after a life of starving to pig herself out and pack those pounds. She had hold those thoughts back because of the fear of being banished by her friends for lying. Maybe if she just eats a little more then usual she could gain weight in a slow tempo, without making her friends noticing.

What should she do?
115111.title: Yes.

1151111.content:
Her guilty pleasures finally got the best of her. She had made up her minds. Tomorrow Rita was going see how much she could eat.

There were five rich dogs living on the blocks. Hans, Brad, Erik, Walt and John. Rita was going to visit them all and get herself stuffed at every house.

The first one to visit was Hans a Scottish terrier. Being a bit of an (Excuse pun) old dog, He was easy as usual to seduce. Her slim figure and beautiful face could make him do what ever she wanted to. Once inside she started to eat. Rita had learnt because of her many visiting’s what kind of dog-food each dog have. Hans’s dog-food was pretty good and filling. Nothing amazing compared to the food she was going to eat at the other dogs, but good for a start. When she had eaten enough she took like she used to do some rests in a bag and walked of.

After visiting a dog she took a walk around the block to make it look like for the dog she just been at that she was leaving. When she comes back she hide the bag with food in a bush before she started to go to the next house. Taking a look at herself she could see that she had a little full stomach. She felt like she could go on about a half day before she hungry again.

The second dog to visit was Brad. While Hans was an old little dog, Brad was a big, young and strong Doberman. He and Rita was in about same age and when Rita had seen him flirting her, she to felt a little something to him. Being a heavily training dog he had dog-food that was healthier and just okay in taste. To get the result that she wanted Rita had to eat much more then what was the normal portion. Brad started to wonder if Rita had have enough when he saw that her belly started to get big and hanging. Rita answered that she could take the rest of the food with her and eat later and walked away.

During her walk around the block she thought that her plan was near to fall. Brad got suspicious and it was near that she could have been forced to tell the truth. She would rather die then letting anyone know. While hiding the other sack she saw that her belly looked rather full now. She could feel how it was starting to stretch her skin because she had never been so full before, and it even started to become heavy and weight her down. She was wondering how she was going to get in to the other three dogs house looking like this.

She ranged on the door to the house of the third dog Erik. Erik was a Golden Retriever boy, who looked to be about the same age as Rita. He was just the handsome looking dog that a lot of girl dogs wanted to be with. While waiting for Erik to open the door, Rita was trying to pull in her stomach. But she was so full that it wouldn’t move in. When Erik opened the door Rita was frozen for a moment. Her little plan on eating from all of the dogs could be destroyed if Erik finds out. But before she could come up with an explanation to her state Erik said, “My god! Since when did you get with pups?” It was just like Erik just had given her the perfect excuse to tell him. Given herself a quick look she realized that she actually looked pregnant. “Well, about a week ago. It was that long since we saw each other?” Rita asked. “Yeah, but I don’t remember that we ever did “that” together.” Erik said looking a bit nervous while he was staring at Rita’s belly. “Oh, I’m sorry. I forgot to tell that I know the father to these kids.” Rita lied while giving a little giggle to Erik for his reaction of thinking he was suddenly a father. “So why are you here?” Erik asked. “Well, we have it a bit rough right now with food. So I was just cheeking if a certain dog could provided with food for my little baby’s.” Rita said and gave her tummy a little clap. “Of course.” Erik said and let her in. Erik’s food was just like him very sweet. Rita had some trouble eating at first seeing that her belly was stretches not by puppies, but of already eaten food. But to keep it a secret for Erik Rita forced herself to eat almost all of the food that she usually gets when eating at home of Erik. She took a bag of food that she said was to her husband at home (Which was a lie) before leaving.

As she was going to leave the third bag with the rest she thought about how she was felling right now. She felt overfull and, had a belly that looked like she was 3 weeks pregnant. Her stomach made a lot of sounds when it was trying to digest all the food she had eaten. Rita was wondering f she could take any more, and if she could keep the truth hidden?

What should she do?
1151111.title: The five rich dogs part 1.

11511111.content:
If she had decided that she was going to do this, then she was going to do it. She started to walk up the little staircase to the house. Even if it just was four steps Rita saw that it became a bit hard for her to walk up because of her belly heaving her down. Thing didn’t get better when Walt (A Great Dane) opened the door and when Rita was going to say hello she instead accidently gave a little burp. “Excuse me?” Walt said. “Just a little snack I had before getting here.” Rita said trying to look convincing. “I have to eat a lot since I’ve got these.” Rita said and pointed to her bloated stomach. To her delight she saw how Walt looked at her stomach and seemed to fell for it. “But wasn’t it just a week since we saw each other last?” Walt asked. “Well you know, when kids come they grow at a fast spurt.” Rita said to him. Walt decided to trust Rita’s words since he, as a male didn’t know how it was to have kids. So after righting that out Walt invited Rita to help her feed (What he thought it was) her puppies.

Being a Great Dane his food was big to match his size. They were big both in size and in amount of calories. Just one bit was like small boulder in her paw, and it felt like it weight a half-pound. When she had eaten with him before, he had usually been the one were she had been eating least food from. This was because his food was so big that Rita simply couldn’t eat much. Now she was almost forced by Walt to eat more then usual for the sake of her “puppies”. Rita was starting to regret the whole pregnancy thing. For every bit that she ate, she could feel how her already bloated and heaving stomach just became heavier and crowded by all the extra food. The whole feeling of overeating had gone from pleasure to a bit painful. She started to wonder if she would physically be able to eat all the food that the last dog John would give her when she visits him? Or if she was going too able too just finish Walt’s food? After what felt like an eternity she was finally done eating… for now. She took a quick look at her stomach. It was so round that it looked like her “puppies” was almost ready to be born. Rita felt much more heavy to. By now she felt like she had 80 pounds of dog-food in her belly. While she was taken her bag with rest to go Walt asked another suspicious question. “Doesn’t it look a bit to big to be pups?” “Well” Rita said, “It puppies and food in it now.” Like all the other lies Rita had told him he bought this one too. So Rita said goodbye to Walt and walked away.

The last dog Rita had to see was John. John is a pug, and a very overweight one for that matter. He had lots of thick chins in his face, a flabby chest, wide legs and an enormous belly to match the rest of his body. He seemed to weight around 200 pounds. He had always been the easiest one to get in to because he seemed to be in love with Rita, and she herself had started to feel a little for him. She seemed to have something for guys with extra weight. When she had been eating at his place it always seemed like he was trying to do something to her. His food was always very fattening, and he tried every time to give more food when she said that she felt full. It looked like he was trying to make her fatter, to have her as his overweight girlfriend.

While Rita was climbing the staircase like it was a mountain, she though about if it was any chance that he could fool John in that she was pregnant. (Because her belly looked like she had 20 that where one years old.) John hadn’t done more than open the door before Rita saw in the way he looked at her belly and then in her eyes that he saw that she was stuffed with food. Without any idea of how to explain John suddenly said, “So you finally decided to become a gainer?” Rita answered quickly “Yes!” (It was some true. She wanted to eat herself fat, but not for him. But it seems like better then tell the truth right now.) Well inside John started to give Rita some of his food to eat. His food was like you could guess very high in fat and calories. But it was also very addictive. It could make a dog with a weak mind completely dependent to continuing eating until there's no more food left. It wasn’t the best food to have to last, because Rita know that it tastes delicious but was very hard to quit eating from, and right now her stomach felt like it was about to explode of all the food that was eaten.

She still managed to eat a good deal of food. Very little compared to how much she could eat at John before mentally stopping herself. This time it was because her body simply couldn’t manage to eat one more bit. She had lay on her back to make pain feel less. Her belly bloated out like balloon. She could also feel with her paws how stretched her skin was. It felt like a drum. It was so thin that thanks to the lights in the house she could see silhouettes of the food that she had eaten. It felt like it weight more then she did at the beginning of this journey. John couldn’t help but to touch her massive bulk. Rita moaned when she felt John’s paw press her. John apologise and said that he knows a massage that he used to do on himself when he had eaten to much, and started to give it to Rita.

Rita wasn’t sure what to do. On one paw she knew that she had to go back to her friends with the food she had been collecting from all the dogs. But on the other paw she felt so stuffed and in a real need of a rest. She had John by her side that gave a massage and some good company. But she couldn’t just leave her friends.

“I'm sorry, but I really have to go!” Rita said while trying to get up. After a few tries she found that with her enormous belly it was impossible on her own. She asked John if he could help her get up. John was split for a moment about what to do. On one paw he knew that he now had the dog he secretly loves lying helpless, a situation that he know never would come again. On the other paw he knew that if he really loves her he should respect her and let her do what she wants.

What was he going to do?
11511111.title: The five rich dogs part 2.

115111111.content:
John realized that even if he loves Rita, he knew that she wouldn’t love him if he kept her prisoned. So he stretches out a paw to help Rita to get up. Rita was so thankful for his helping that she gave him a little kiss on the cheek before she took the garbage bag with food and left. John knew now two things.
1. The kiss proved that maybe Rita felt something to for him.
2. By his acting of helping her she would probably like to see him some more.

Outside Rita knew that the hardest bit of her little “adventure” was yet to come. She would have to drag five big garbage bags with food all the way to the houseboat. She had hard time walking even a few steps with her dragging stomach. Now she has to do it while dragging some heavy weights to.

Another trouble was that during this walk she and her food would be very vulnerable. There was nothing that says that she was going to be able to defend herself if some other dogs would come to take her food.

She also didn’t have any collar. That means if any dogcatcher saw her they would have all right to catch her. She wasn’t in any form to run.

The last but not least thing to think about, She had to come up with a good explanation to why she had been gone for almost all day and looked like she did.

“But” she thought, “If I have the body to manage all this! (Looking down on her giant belly) Then I should also have the brain to think out some smart excuse.”

So she started her journey home.

How does her journey go?
115111111.title: Let her go.

1151111111.content:
It was originally a 1-hour walk through the town from the rich block to the houseboat for Rita. But with her added weight it would become almost three times longer trip for her to walk. Not only because all that she had eaten would slow her pace and make her do a lot of breaks, but because of detours she would have to take to not risk to meet any other dogs or dogcatchers.

Her long journey took her trough streets, parks, and docks. Her added weight had actually helped her give her a new look at the city that she had never thought of before, the felling of the ground. With her belly being in constant contact with the ground she could almost know just were she was just by felling the ground with her belly. Her paws weren’t as sensitive being that they had been shaped to be able to walk on all sorts of terrains. Her belly's contact with the ground was like the fingers of a blind person reading braille.

So as she walked her belly got to feel wide variations of surfaces. She got to know that resting your overfull stomach on concrete plates that got heated up by the sun was a good way to helping your digestion of the food. To having it covered in mud from a mud pool in a park was like giving it a pleasant massage, and that the slippery planks on the docks actually made it easier for her to drag both her heavy belly and bags of food. Next time she stuffs herself so it hurts, she now knows to go to some of these places to make her stomach fell better.

As she was almost at the end of her walk she checked with herself one more time about the false story to tell the gang for why she had been gone for all day. As she went it through in her head she thought that it should work. As she was getting down into the houseboat she saw that all of the gang had heard her when she was dragging all the bags down. They all looked shocked at first of what they saw, then Dodger took and asked, “What has happened to you and where did all this food come from?”

“Well…” Rita said, “You know that I lately had found a lot of food in the dumpster that belongs to the rich dogs?” Everybody in the gang nodded. “Well I got curious about where all that food they throw away went, so I followed the garbage truck that took care of their food. It lead me to a special garbage dump somewhere outside of town. It had only throwaway food, I first though that I was in heaven. I'll ate and ate all that I could eat. Then I knew that I couldn’t just be selfish and only let myself have this, so I packed five garbage bags (that I just happened to find) full with all kinds of food that there was. When I was on my way to get out some of the workers on the dump found me and tried to capture me. I rust all I could with the bags to get out and get back home. I succeeded to escape them but it was so rough to run in my current state that I collapsed when I knew I was safe, and when I woke up I didn’t know where I was or where the dump was. After a while if got into town and then I found my way back home with the food.” Rita said and hoped that she sounded convincing.

What would the gang think?
1151111111.title: She makes it.

11511111111.content:
After a moment of silence the other dogs looked at Dodger to speak for the gang of what they though of Rita´s story. After much nervousness Rita could finally feel safe when she heard Dodger say “It´s a good thing that you are still alive. Just promise that next time you tell us so you are not doing dangerous things by yourself.” Rita was almost near to blow it for herself by looking a little glad while Dodger said this, but she quickly realized what she was doing and made sure too keep to the act.

After Dodger had told Rita what to do next time she thought about going out on a risky adventure, it was time for a feast! All the dogs (Except Rita who was still a bit full after all her eating) started to gorge themselves with all kinds of different foods that Rita had fixed them. For all the dogs this was an ones in a lifetime experience, to for the first in a long time to really eat to your own limits. As Rita was laying aside and watch she could see how all the dogs she lives with were really happy. It felt a bit hard inside to know that there was dogs that had more food then they could eat before there lives ends, and that there was dogs like Rita and the gang that was living in poverty. She wished that there were something that she could do to make thing fairer between dogs.

As she was laying and thinking about her secret life and the possibilities she has to make things better she didn´t notice Dodger walking up to her. It wasn’t before she notices something casting a shadow over her that she looked up. She saw that it was Dodger, and then she saw something different about him. He had a little belly hanging. She must have been daydreaming for long time because when she looked around she could see that all of the other dogs had been eaten a lot. Dodger had been stuffing himself enough to give himself a little potbelly when all of the food was digested. Francis laid on the his back felling really bloated, and no wonder he had eaten so much that his belly was stretch out and rounded. It sounds cliché to say but his belly really looked like an inflated beach ball. Just as round and big and with a skin almost as tight. Even Einstein who was the biggest in size had succeeded in eating too much. His belly (that was the one highest from the ground being that he is the tallest) was almost touching the ground, and swaying a little with every move he made.

Dodger laid himself next to Rita to make it more comfortable. Then all of a sudden they heard Tito´s voice saying “Just look at you to fatty lovers!” As Rita and Dodger looked at him they saw that he wasn’t any skin and bones himself, he was actually the fattest of them all. Being that he was the smallest it didn’t take much food to stuff him. His belly was so big and round that it lifted him from the ground, and the only way for him to move was to lean on his hind legs and push the rest of his body. “Hey Rita” he said. “I haven’t seen you eat anything since you came back. Are you not in shape for a little eating contest?”

This shouting of a challenge to Rita had got the other dogs attention. They seemed interested in this thing and were starting to make bets to eats other. Rita was a bit unsure a first if she should this. Her stomach had been in pain all day for being stuffed and moved all the time, and she felt that the time she spent laying next to Dodger was really relaxing. But at the same time most she didn’t want to disappoint the other dogs that really wanted to see this eating battle. When she thought about it, it seemed that it would be an easy match also. Being that she had been resting while Tito had been eating like crazy, and that whit Tito being the smaller dog it didn’t seemed like Rita had to eat much to win.

What will she chose?
11511111111.title: They believe her.

115111111111.content:
After getting a lot of nagging from Tito, Francis and Einstein, and a little nod from Dodger Rita said “Eh, What the heck? Let’s do this!”

All the other dogs had cheered her a little for her participation they started to prepare for the eating duel. Dodger and Einstein took a table and started to fill dog bowls with food. To make it easy for Francis (who almost couldn’t move because of his overfull gullet) to see they took and put the table besides him so he didn’t have to try look over his mountain of a stomach to see. Rita and Tito place themselves in positions and waited for the signal to start.

A “Dong” sound from an old saucepan beaten by Dodger became the start signal. Rita took an easy start while Tito took and stuffed himself like crazy from the start. When she was only halfway done with her first bowl Tito had already started on his second. Rita started to eat a bit faster now knowing that even if Tito would be finished soon, she at least wanted to be equal in mass of food that had been eaten.

After the third bowl Rita started too feel a little packed again. She could feel how her stomach started to get a little full. She looked over at Tito who still ate as wild like he had from the start. “If he´s not going to stop soon I´ll think his body is going to do it for him.” Rita thought while looking at him. And she was right.

After eating four bowls of high calories and high fattening dog food Tito showed no sings of stopping. But when he was going to start on his fifth something was wrong. He couldn’t bend forward to eat from the bowl. Looking down to see why chocked him a little. His belly had expanded so much that none of his legs was touching the ground! He couldn’t make any contact with the ground with any of his legs how much he tried.

The contest had to stop for a moment to see what’s to do.

“So, is Tito finished?” Einstein asked.
“No way man! I can still eat much more!” Tito yelled.
“So what does we do then?” Rita asked.
“I think someone has to help feed Tito.” Dodger said.
“Ok, fine. But who would do it?” Tito asked.
“I can do it.” Einstein said.
“Ok, lets start this contest again and start feed me.” Tito said.

Dodger bonked the saucepan again and the contest had started again. While Rita started now to eat faster then before, Tito was in a slower pace because of Einstein´s feeding. “Come on man! Your making me lose!” Tito yelled.
“I´m sorry. I´m just trying to be careful and not risking you choke anything.” Einstein said.
“Dude, It an Eating Contest! The whole thing with it is to eat as much you can in the smallest time.” Tito said.
“Oh.” Einstein said finally understanding what an eating contest was about.
“So you want me to give you the food quicker?” Einstein asked.
“Yes! As fast as you can! I don´t wanna lose!” Tito yelled, angry over that Rita was on her way to take the lead.
“Ok, but don´t say I didn´t warn you.” Einstein said and started to hand over food as fast as he could.

He was actually as he tried to warn Tito much faster then anyone believed. He started to go just faster and faster. So fast in fact that Tito didn´t had a chance to actually chew some of the food, and was starting to swallow large bits of whole food. During the break for filling the bowls for round eight Tito got a chance to talk to Einstein. He said that while making him swallow whole pieces was a way to empty the bowl quicker, it also made it harder for his stomach to get room for more food because the bigger food was taking longer to digest. He asked Einstein if there was any “middle” pace he could hold? Einstein answered that he was going to see if he could find some for the next round.

During the break Rita had something to say to Dodger who was referee for the match. “I think this is unfair.”
“What is unfair?” Dodger asked.
“With someone to help feed Tito he has no problem to finish his round. He get eating much quicker then I possibly can.” Rita explained.
“Well, I think I know a solution to that.” Dodger said while giving a little smirk at Rita.
“What´s that?” Rita asked.
“I´ll be feeding you.” Dodger said.

So with the help of each feeder who will win the contest?
115111111111.title: Food eating duel

choices: Rita wakes up in the middle of the night.
1151111111111.content:
With the help of Dodger to give her food Rita had no problems to gain (No pun intended) a little lead over Tito during their eight round. Rita´s belly was in “Halfway pregnant” stage, while Tito´s whole body was starting to get rounded to get room for the food.

Being the bigger dog Rita had no problem eating bigger amounts of food then Tito. But the little dog had an obsession to win that seems to be bigger then his belly, and both didn’t seem wanting to quit for a while.

After doing four more rounds like this Rita and Tito seemed both to be slowing down a bit. Mostly Tito. While Rita was almost as bloated as she was after she had been eating at Walt, (The fourth rich dog.) Tito was starting to be swelled up as a football.

During the twelfth round Rita was almost twice as quick on finishing her food then Tito was. Starting to feel a bit desperate Tito said to Einstein that he had to do the “fast pace” again. “Are you sure?” Einstein asked. “Yeah I´m sure. Speed it up” was Tito´s response. Einstein just said “okay” and started to do his “high paced feeding” again.

By now Rita was about to feel as full so it´s hurts like when she started to eat the food from John (The fifth dog), while Tito seemed to have no limits for how far he could stretch his stomach. His whole body started to reach football size.

Who was going to win? (Yeah I know it´s a bit unnecessary to ask that when you have picked that Rita should win, but I just want to make it a bit exiting and be great on the details on their gains.)

For the sixteenths round both Rita and Tito found themselves near their limits. Rita felt like she was almost at the same state as when she finished John’s meal, and Tito simply was about to stop soon. His sphere of a body was about to reach it´s limit.

Both Einstein and Dodger realized that none of the eaters would be able to finish their meal on their own. So both the feeders had to see which one who could make that last piece of food into their contester. Dodger saw that a bit of Rita´s pains was that her heaved belly was pressing against both the floor and her legs, so he told her to lay herself on her back to ease the pain. Rita did as she was told and felt a little bit better with her stomach being free from the press, making it easier to eat the last bit of food. Einstein was about to tell Tito to do the same when he saw that his stomach was so widely spread that it didn´t mater what side he put him in. He saw that Rita had just finished her last bits, and started to press Tito´s last food in his mouth to make him swallow. But it was impossible. Every little bit that was left came back up every time Tito swallowed. His body had reached it limit. It was so full of food that nothing even with force could be put in there.

Knowing now that his body had finally given up Tito accepted his lost and congratulated Rita for the victory. Afterwards all the dogs went to sleep.
1151111111111.title: Rita

11511111111111.content:
The next morning Rita found out that she was the only one that had woken up. She took a look at her friends and saw that during the night all that eaten food had started to take effect.

First she looked at Dodger. She saw that he had got a little (Compared to the other dogs) belly. It wasn´t enormous but it was bigger then the average dog. Except from that it wasn´t much else of him that had changed. He just looked like he had a big meal.

Francis was heavy sleeping with a smile on his face. He had all night been complaining of being in big pain for overstuffing himself. He hadn’t even tried to move because of belly hurting to much. During the night his resting had made his belly more soft and less stretched. It was still very big and round, but this time it was more of a basketball size then a beach ball size. He had started to get some small mans breasts, His arms and legs was a bit flabby with fat and it also looked like he had got a couple of extra chins, and some puffed cheeks.

Einstein had one of the biggest bellies of the gang, only being beaten by Francis. During the night his stomach seemed to be the one that have shrunken the most. It was almost half as big as it was before he went to sleep. Half of his belly fat had spread itself all over his body during the night. His dangling cheeks were now smaller because his face was now more thick. He had now even two-three double chins. His legs looks wider and even his rump looked a little plumped.

Then she took a look at the one that had been her competitor last night, Tito. During most of the duel Rita hasn’t looked over at Tito´s side to see how he was doing, she had been to focus on her own eating. So seeing him now in his immobile, bloated state come as a little chock for her. (She didn’t thought about looking how she self looked, I´m saving it for the next chapter.)

While she looked over of how fat her friends was her stomach gave a little growl. It wasn’t a big one (more like the one you get when you just started to get a little hungry.) but Rita had been obsessed with the felling of overeating. So for her this little growl was an enormous roar for food.

She was on her way to go when she took one more look on her friends. Was she going to leave her friends while she was going to have a big block-long feast? Or could there be a way to even let her friends get food chaired by the rich dogs?

What should she do?
11511111111111.title: The next morning.

115111111111111.content:
Another growl from her stomach had her making up her mind. She had to go. When she come out of the houseboat she noticed that it actually was 10am outside. She and the gang must have been partying longer then she thought. No wonder the other dogs looked so tired when Rita woke up.

On her way to the rich dogs Rita first walked, then jogging a bit, and then started to run. It didn’t take long before Rita had to walk again. She knew that she ate some last night, but she couldn’t think the thought to look at herself and see what all that eating have done to her.

When she arrived she knocked on the door to Hans. Hans opened and Rita did her old seductive thing to trick the old terrier. She blinked her eyes, wagged her hips, and stretched her legs to make herself look sexy. But she saw after a moment of doing it that Hans didn’t seemed seduced. He seemed more chocked. “What has happened to your body?” he asked. Rita then did what she hadn’t done since evening yesterday. Looked at her own body.

She got a bit shocked herself of how what changes her body had made after all the eating from the rich dogs, and from the food duel with Tito.

She saw that on her front legs the part that was over the knee was building up with fat and was working its way down to her feet’s. Her front legs looked like a couple of drumsticks from a chicken.
Her back legs on the other hand were so fat that they would have been rubbing each other, if it wasn’t for her enormous stomach that was pushing out on the sides and back so her back legs were forced to spread out a bit.
She had started to get some big breasts and a big jiggling butt to match.
She could also feel that her face also seemed a bit swelling, and she could fell that she had a double chin.

She looked so strange for being a dog. If she had been standing on he back legs she would almost look like a fat woman. If her weight before all this had been 60 pounds, then now she must weight double as much at least. She now understood that what he had seen was her showing of her fleshy legs and backside mass.

What were Hans going think about Rita´s new look?
115111111111111.title: She goes by herself.

choices: To one of the other rich dogs.
1151111111111111.content:
At first he just stares and have his mouth hanging open. Then his cheeks starts to go up and could see a grin was starting to form on him.

“Y-You like my look?” Rita asked a bit nervous.

“Like it? I love it!” was Hans respond.

He then took of and clung himself to her stomach. Loving how wonderfully soft it was. At first Rita surprised (and almost dragged to the ground), but then happy that Hans wasn’t angry of her gain.

After hugging her big belly enough he told her that if she ever wanted anything to eat he would be more then happy to offer her some of his food. He then asked her if she would have some food right now. Before Rita got a chance to answer her stomach growled. “I´ll take that as a yes.” Hans said and lead Rita in.

Before Rita had just been taken easy of the eating because she planned to eat from more then one dog. Now Hans was willing to give her all the food she needed to give the result they both wanted. Rita noticed also that Hans now was ready to do anything to help her gain. He poured food into a bowl for her. He took and filled all the time so it wouldn’t run out of food for her to eat. He even took his time too help raising food from the bowl to Rita´s mouth.

After lots of eating Rita and Hans seemed to bee finished for today. “I´ll have to have something to eat for myself too.” Hans said. All that eating had made Rita so heavy she needed help to stand up. Her belly looked almost as big as it was right after the food duel with Tito.

Rita said thanks and goodbye to Hans and waddled herself out of his house.

Where would Rita go next?
1151111111111111.title: He loves her.

11511111111111112.content:
Rita thought that she had just been lucky with Hans actually liking her fat. She decided that the best thing to do should be to return home. Lucky for her the block where the rich dogs lived in was in a very high point of the city. That had been a relief for her because after every big meal it hadn’t been so hard too walk back home. When she had to walk back up too them the day after the food had been digested by then, and she didn’t have so much extra weight to pull up.

So she started running home. Or tried too, but she found quickly out that running with a big round belly that hold more then half of your bodyweight wasn’t a very smart idea. It leads her to lose her balance and starting to roll down the street. For people (or dogs) passing by it looked like a overstuffed and furry (excuse pun) hotdog that was rolling by.

Rita finally got a stop of her rolling when she rolled into a (convenient placed) removal box full with pillows. After getting up on her legs (after much struggle.) Rita made sure to walk the last part home.

When she got home she saw that other dogs still hadn’t woke up. “I must have been the first one that went to bed last night.” Rita thought. Right then she noticed Einstein was started to wake up. And when he woke up so wasn’t it long before the other did the same. She took and fined her place were she slept last night. She then pretended to sleep so no one would know that she had been out today.

Soon after she got in position Einstein started to wake up. He yawed loudly and kicked his large legs, accidently hitting some of his pals. (It was actually a common way that for them to bee woken up by.) As they where starting to woke, Rita pretended to do the same thing.

Are they going to see through Rita´s act?
11511111111111112.title: Back to the houseboat.

choices: He hates how obese he is.
115111111111111122.content:
“God morning Rita.” Dodger said. “God morning” Rita replied.

Rita and Dodger shared a moment looking into each other’s eyes, but the sound of Rita´s belly digesting the food she had have at Hans got Dodger´s attention. “Are you still digesting the food you ate last night?” Dodger asked suspicious. “Well, I ate a lot last night.” Rita answered (Hoping that Dodger would believe the excuse.) Dodger is first quiet, then he says “Well, You and Tito did in fact eat a lot.”

They took a look at the other dogs that was starting to get up.

Einstein´s fat had been divided all over his body. His face was more rounded with thicker cheeks and multiple chins. His legs where like four tree trunks. He still had a very big belly that reached to his knees. He had a body that resemble an elephant. He even had thanks to his fatten feet´s and enormous belly got the walking style of an elephant.

Francis had before sleeping a belly so big and round and heavy that he was pinned down by it. After a night sleeps his belly had shrink enough too let him stand on all four again. It was still very big and round. It was so big that it was giving a light touch to the floor. It was also so round that it had him to spread his legs so much that you could get a good look at it even if you were looking at the front. The food that had been digested during the night had now gotten spread all over his body. His face was puffy, his legs were thick and his butt was inflated. His whole body had become more of the one of a slob.

When Tito was starting to wake the other dogs got a bit worried. After the big food duel against Rita Tito´s whole body had gotten a big ball shape. Even after a night of sleep and digestion his body still was as round as before. The other dogs were now worried that when he wakes he is going to be horrified by his new body.

The strange thing was that Tito didn’t seem to notice that he was so fat and round that he was immobile. He yawned, stretched his paw (Most of his legs were consumed by his fat.) and scratched his body with his little paws. Then he saw the looks on everyone else starring at him.

“What is it?” he asked, not at all noticing that his paws was in the air and his belly was the only thing making contact with the floor. The other got a bit unsure of how to tell him, and who should do it. First Dodger tried “Well, you were really into the eating duel last night.” “Yeah?” Tito said still confused. “And you are not in the same size like us.” Rita hinted to him. “So what do you mean?” Tito asked a little annoyed for not getting any straight answers. “Einstein.” Tito said. “Can you say what the thing is?” Einstein first looked at his friend and then at Tito and said. “You have become a beach ball.” “What?” Tito said and then examined his body. Realizing how it finally was he became quiet for a moment.

What was his reaction to his state going to be?
115111111111111122.title: The day after for the others.

choices: One of them seems to like her new look.
1151111111111112.content:
His expression went from surprise to anger. “You! Who were such a beauty before, have now let yourself become this! Get out! I don´t want to see you here anymore!” Hans barked and slammed the door in from of Rita´s (now chubby) face.

Rita felt a bit sad of Hans hating her. “But (She thought) at least I have four other dogs to try and get food from.”

She tried the second dog that was Brad the athlete. This time before the door opened she tried too such in her stomach, trying too trick him in believing she was still the same. But as soon as he saw Rita, she knew that he saw something wasn’t right. Looking at Rita Brad saw a female dog who while having her stomach looking normal, had the rest of her body overweight. Rita couldn’t hold her stomach in much longer, (Being fatter had made her stretch muscles weaker too.) and it fell down, making the rest of her body almost drag down to the ground of the sudden pressure. She felt a bit ashamed, but was still on her way to try and give some kind of explanation to her current state. But before she got a chance to start Brad said. “So you just used me as a way to pig yourself with my food. Well I´m goanna set a stop for it right Now!” and then he slammed and locked the door, leaving Rita felling a bit more down.

Still with a small ounce of hope, Rita decides to try at the third dog (Erik). But this time Eric just got a glimpse of her state before he slammed his door. “Well, I can understand him.” Rita thought. “I tricked him in believing that he had made me pregnant.” And with that Rita sat down wondering if it was even worth going to the last two dogs? “They are going to probably hate me to.” Rita thought. “But it would feel better to let them see the truth, then keeping it a secret.”

How are the two remaining dogs going to react?
1151111111111112.title: He hates her.

11511111111111122.content: Which one of them likes her?
11511111111111122.title: One of them seems to like her new look.

115111111111111222.content:
She tries with Walt, but gets the same result like with the other ones.

While walking to John, Rita was thinking about what to do if he to hates her? Was she going to go back to live with her friends poor and with no food? Would she even have friends? If she couldn’t get any food from ay of the dogs, then her friends would realise that she had have all the control of the food. They were probably going to make her leave the houseboat. Thus making her completely alone and unable too survive. (Being morbidly obese and all.)

She knocked at John's door and when he opened he just stared at her. And slowly Rita saw a facial expression of joy on John. At first she didn’t get why. But then she remembered that last time they meet he said that he wanted to have a fat girl. So seeing her now much fatter then before was like a gift from heaven to him.

“I see your beauty have grown since we last saw each other.” Walt said and started stroking Rita’s belly. Rita felt her cheeks blush a little by Walt's compliment and touching. Was it that she too was starting to have some feeling for him?

“Do you need to eat some?” Walt asked, but got interrupted by Rita's stomach growling. “I'll take that as a yes.” Walt said and led her in. While inside Walt asked if it were something special she would like. Rita asked him what kind of food he had. “Well” Walt said “Right now I have two types of food.

The first one is called Whale chops. They are bits of meat and fat from whales. They are very high in calories and fat, and also very big in size. In taste they are just okay, but they are in big help if you ant your meal to make your fatter.

The other one is named Thin but tasty bacon. They are more thin in size and in amount of calories. But they have much better taste and you can enjoy eating more of them before getting full.

So which of the two foods are Rita going to chose?
115111111111111222.title: John.

1151111111111112221.content:
"Well I've always been one for new foods..." Rita said as she tried to sound fancy. "I think I'll go with the whale chops...please."
John smiled, "Excellent choice..." He seemed a bit demented as he said that, but with no time to question it, the rich dog had popped a large chunk of blubber into Rita's fat maw.
Rita groaned and snorted, whale was chewier than she thought. As soon as she swallowed it, she felt her stomach growl loudly, she looked at John embarrassedly, but he seemed to be fine with her hunger.
He fed her another.
And another.
And another.
And another...
In fact, he wouldn't stop feeding the almost immobile she-mutt. "'Tis but the most fattening thing on the planet my darling..." He moaned under his breath.
Rita heard this: "FATTENING?! If I get any bigger I won't be able to move!"
"Nonsense, you don't need to move...you have me. I can always come to you. Those other scums won't. I bet they barley even know your gone. Plus, I know you want to be a whale. I know that you want to be bigger than the earth. And your option to move was a long time ago." He slinky smirked.
Rita looked down at herself, she was a monster. She hadn't even realized that John had been sitting on her belly rolls that surged forward like an ocean. Rita felt something squishy behind her, she knew it only could of been her two large bubbles of s butt. Her legs have been mushed or sucked into her girth, either one, Rita didn't even know for sure. She felt her swollen face with her tongue. Seven rolls of fat hung from her chin and her cheeks have become the size of large oranges.
She gasped at her new figure.
"They will come back for me! And find me before I do become a whale, or a planet or, whatever you said! You're a huge a-"
She was interrupted by another blob of porpoise.
"That's nice dear, but have fun calling for help when all you can speak is whale..." And he stuffed another whale chop into her greasy maw
1151111111111112221.title: Whale chops.

choices: John licks, rubs, hugs and tickles her belly, much to his and Rita's delight!
Rita suddenly has a heart attack due to her morbid obesity and so much bacon!
1151111111111112222.content:
Rita said: "I'd like the bacon, please! I just LOVE bacon!" "Okay, then, very well, coming right up, my corpulent beauty of a portly, pretty princess!" John replied as he stood up on his hind legs and grabbed the bacon container, which he then poured into one of the bowl's. He waited until it was empty, and said: "Okay, Rit! Dig in!" Rita said: "Thank you, John!" and started to chow down subsequently. She loved the way it tasted instantaneously. She had enjoyed delicious bacon before, but she'd never had bacon THIS good in her life and didn't think such perfect, indescribably succulent bacon could have ever existed until now! She didn't leave a speck of it, and it was not long before she'd finished it, either, the flavor just making her feel like her taste buds were in utter heaven.

Once she was finished, she was also full as the dickens, so she fell onto her back, easily exposing her gargantuan gut as she gasped: "God, am I full. So full I don't think I've ever been this full in my life. But it was more than worth it. That bacon was, like...WOW...in the best way...OH, John, this could be the start of a beautiful relationship, I just know it." "I agree completely, and I am glad you liked it so much." John smiled. "Anything for one as lovely and charming and delightful as you, Rita." Rita smiled and blushed, and so did he, but then John was taken aback(in a good way)by how beautiful, alluring and hypnotic he found the site of the massively obese Rita's mountain of a belly. Rita could tell what was getting him so overjoyed, being as smart as she was and always had been, and told him: "Do whatever you want to it. You were good to me and my belly, and now it's time for me and my belly to be good to you."

John was quite pleased and said: "Thank you, Rita. This will be quite heavenly, not unlike your experience with the bacon I gave you, in fact."

What was to happen next was...
1151111111111112222.title: Shakin' For Bacon!

choices: "Do you want to live here with me?"
"Rita, are you in love with me, my dear?"
Actually, he said something different instead.
11511111111111122221.content:
What happened next was pure pleasure to Rita, appearing in the form of John proceeding to give her fat form a nice belly rub. "Oooooh, this feels soooo goooood, John! Keep doing it. *Sultry giggle*" Rita moaned, feeling the overweight Pug licking her on the snout while he pressed his own flabby gut against her own, slowly rubbing in a circular motion.

"With pleasure, my dear." John replied, continuing the barrage of passionate licks, long blissful belly rubs, and the occasional tickling of Rita's love handles, causing the rotund female Saluki to giggle in a rather childish manner, almost like she was a puppy once more. Rita couldn't help herself but give John a lick of her own on his snout, causing both participants to blush from the short moment alone.

However, in the process, Rita began to develop some romantic feelings toward the overweight Pug, as she looked at him with a set of passionate bedroom eyes, romantically seducing John to come a little closer. In response, John took up on her non-verbal offer, as he waddled closer toward Rita, pressing their blubbery bellies even more. In one quick motion, Rita quickly wrapped her slightly plump forelegs around John in a big fat doggy hug, giving the overweight Pug another playful lick on the snout.

From there, John moved his chubby head, liking up at the rotund Rita and asked.....
11511111111111122221.title: John's Delight, Rita's Pleasure

11512.content: What kind of shape does the Rita's lover have?
11512.title: By falling in love with a dog who likes to feed...

115122.content: Is he tall and Fat?
115122.title: Other shape.

1151222.content: Is he short and thin?
1151222.title: Other shape 2

11512222.content: Is he short and fat?
11512222.title: Other shape 3

11513.content:
Life was good for Fagin and his dogs now. Sykes was gone and so were his Dobermans. Fagin had gotten a job as a cleaner for the Foxworths, and this even allowed it so he could live in their mansion along with his dogs, just like Georgette, Oliver, Jenny and Winston lived in it now. It was the best of both worlds for everyone. And because Fagin had helped in ridding the world of Sykes, he and his dogs were exonerated from all their past crimes, especially since they made it clear they wouldn't have done it if they had any other options and if Fagin wasn't so poor and desperate. They also swore an oath to never steal again. However, just as a reminder of what they once were and why they should be knowledgeable of the fact crime doesn't pay, an NYC cathedral priest gave them a special book. It was a book that focused around all kinds of sin, vice, crime and wrongdoing, and why it was wrong and to be avoided at all costs. Fagin was to read it to his dogs once a week, so they would remember why it was so important they made the change they did and why they were let off the hook this time, but might not have been if some things had been a different matter.

Now, this book, unbeknownst to any of them, or to anyone, including the priest, for that matter, was not just a book on sin and the like. It was also a book which was, in its own way, quite magical. And part of it consisted of the seven deadly sins chapter, which started with gluttony. After a few days of reading it each night, Fagin had reached that very chapter and marked his place. And though all his dogs listened well when he read it and learned what he did, one of them, Rita, to be exact, was more curious than the others about what was to be seen in the next of chapters. So when Fagin and the other dogs were asleep and so were Oliver, Jenny, Georgette, Winston and the Foxworth parents, Rita snuck to where she'd seen Fagin put the book, grabbed it, took it to a place where there was enough light to read despite how dark it was due to the moon shining through the windows, and opened it up to the gluttony chapter.

She put her paw on where she read to keep track of things and was just about to start reading, when all of a sudden the magic in the book reared its head(so to speak)and went off right at Rita, causing her to be knocked back and knocked out. What Rita didn't know after passing out from this surprise was that, after she woke up the next morning, she would see that the sin of gluttony had passed itself into her from that book mystically, at least in a way, and the result of it was that, while she was asleep, she turned out to have gained weight. Along with how her appetite and craving for food had been boosted drastically, but I digress. The exact amount of weight she'd gained to go with what she'd weighed before was...
11513.title: The Magical Deadly Sin Of Gluttony

1152.content: How will the bulldog become big as a bull?
1152.title: Francis

11521.content:
(This is my own version of the movie where Georgette wants Francis to stay with her instead of Tito)

Francis and Georgette's first meeting had not been the best. She had been surprised by Francis and the rest of he dogs in her room when they come to save Oliver. The first thing she saw when she saw Francis was a chubby bulldog who was piging out of her exclusive chocolate, eating like he had not been eating in weeks (Witch was true).

But later on when she had to be a part of a mission to save Jenny, Georgette had found some different sides of Francis. He was very well spoken, He was gentle. And strangely enough she found something very attractive of his round frame.

Georgette had never admit it, but she had always felt something for fat males. She had found it strange at first cause she could never see herself as fat. But then she had been a bit turned on by the thought of having an overweight partner. Someone to live with, to love, to feed. And she felt that Francis could be the one.

After saving Jenny, Georgette took Francis to the side and told about her felling of him. How does he take it?
11521.title: By living with Georgette.

choices: A story involving all three of them.
115211.content:
To Georgette's joy Francis said that he to had found felling for her. He thought that she was elegant, well spoken and of course beautiful. Saying this made both Georgette and Francis to blush a bit, But they know now that they both loved each other.

Later at Jenny's birthday party (Where Fagin and the dogs were invited to for saving her life.) Francis had to take a farewell of his former gang now when he and Oliver were going to live in there new home.

"So your staying here?" Rita asked. "Yes, My heart tells me to stay here" Francis answered trying to sound a bit poetic saying it. "Are you sure it's your heart and not your stomach your'e listening to?" Tito said while giving Francis frame a little poke. That gave everyone a little laugh until Einstein asked. "So this is the last time where gonna see each other?" Francis could see that Einstein had a tear almost falling from his eye. "No, You and the other dogs can visit me anytime you want." Francis said to them all and gave them a group hug.

So how is the life of the two dogs and the cat gonna go?
115211.title: Delight

choices: An invitation to "The fattening dog festival".
An invitation to "The fat dogs couple dinner".
1152112.content:
After living together for four months Francis had really got to know how it is to live in luxury. Or more exactly his body has got to knows it. Since living with Georgette he had gained 280 pounds. His previous weight was about 80 pounds. So he was now weighting 360 pounds.

The first thing to make him gain this much was the sudden change of environment. Before he would have to move and do a lot of things before there was any food, and then he had to share that little food piece with the rest of the gang. But now he could eat as much as he want without doing anything.

And not only that. It was also much thanks to Georgette that he had become obese to. When Jenny gave Georgette food before Francis had moved in she used to give her big portions, because she thinks Georgette looked a bit underfed. So Georgette had to bury almost half of her portions to make Jenny think that she had eaten it. Now when she has Francis she can simply give him her half. And if Francis wanted some more food she could just ask Jenny for more. Francis couldn't do it because Jenny saw that he had have more then enough, but she was whiling to give Georgette more food because she looked like she could need more. Jenny never suspected that Georgette gave that food to Francis.

But it was an other reason to why Georgette was the biggest source to Francis huge weight. Francis had actually thought long before that he might be going to be to fat. But Georgette told him that loved him more and more for every pound that he gained. So Francis decided to grant his lovers wish.

His body had gone through some major changes. To start from the top, His head had some very thick rolls of fat all over his face. His cheeks was so puffed that he always looked like his mouth was full of food even is he didn't have any in it. He didn't have any neck, just neck rolls that looked like they where trying to take over his head. He had six thick chins who seemed to go all the way down to his huge chest. His arms and legs where very fatty to. When he was standing on all four, it looked like his arm and leg fat where starting to cover his paws. His ass was big to. It looked his little tail was about to be engulfed by his huge butt. And then it was his stomach. That was something of fatness. It was so big and fat that the best way to describe it was that it was as round and big as a beach ball. And filled with fat. It was the part of him that cared the most weight. Almost 100 pound of fat was in this perfect ball shaped belly. Even if his belly was hard as a rock Georgette couldn't think about anything better then to rest her head against it like it was a pillow. It was so warm and soft.

With this body it became a bit difficult for Francis to walk. His heavy stomach plus fatten limbs had him to waddle instead of walking.

He usually meet some of his old gang during the wakings. Francis could see that even his friends had gone through some weight changers. They weren't fat but they had got some little bellies now. It seems that after Francis had left the group, They had not have any trouble to get enough food to make them all feed.

The best moments Francis and Georgette could have are when they are laying in front of the fireplace after a huge dinner. Francis is always so exhausted because he eats to his limits. There for it always fells so great for him to have his large belly getting warmed by the fire. It also helps that Georgette gives his belly a massage while he his lying. Georgette enjoys it to, getting to feel the huge, round, warm thing that was Francis belly. Having her paws to stroke it and push in to it to feel how deep she could push them in. She also liked to press her precious face into its warm softness. Snuggling around it and sleep with the dog she loved.

One afternoon when Georgette and Francis have had dinner, she told him that she had something to show him.
1152112.title: Just the dog pair.

11521122.content:
"The fat dogs couple dinner?" Francis asked. "It's a dinner where the fattest dogs in the city and their partners meets for dinner together. It is going to be lots and lots of food to be served just for you and the other fat dogs." Georgette explained. At first this sounded to good to be true for Francis. An exclusive dinner with more food then he had ever eaten before. He was just imagining all piles of food waiting for him. "So are we going?" Georgette asked. "Yes, we are certainly." Francis answered.

Arriving at the dinner, Francis and Georgette get to know who the other guests are. There were four other couples.

First they meet a fat German Shepherd male with an athletic female German Shepard. He’s body was a little weird. He had double chins, a big hanging belly, and a jiggery ass. But his forelegs and hind legs looked more muscles then fat. His legs had bits of fat hanging on them, but they where not near as engulfed in fat as Francis legs. “My name is Frank and this is Linda, my love.” The fat one said. “I am weighing 280 pound, but almost 60 of my pound are the muscles in my legs. I am a police dog. I used to be an attack dog. My job was to chase criminals and vehicles. As you can guess I had a very fit figure. But after one successful criminal catch a policeman awarded me with a doughnut. For the first time in my life I had got a tasted of something sweet. It was just overwhelming me with it’s sugary sweetness. I just wanted to eat more and more doughnuts, nut I know that I then wouldn’t be able to do my work. It was then she came in to my live.” Frank said putting one of his forelegs over his wife’s shoulders. “Or more exactly started at his job.” Linda filled in. “From the moment we saw each other we knew we were meant for each other. (Takes a moment to gives each other a kiss.) Frank became so close to me that he felt he could tell me about his problem.” “At first I just thought that she was going to think I was strange.” Frank said. “Being a police dog who wants to get fat. But to my surprise Linda told me that she had a secret to. That she wanted the man of her dreams to be fat. “ “That’s where I come up with a solution.” Linda filled in. “By hard training I could take the role as the attack dog, and my husband trained to be a drug dog.” “In that job I could just sit in a small corridor and bark when I smelt someone who was careering drugs. But I’m still training a little on my spare time, even if I want to be fat I still want to able to walk.”)

The next pair Francis and Georgette meet was a small Pomeranian female and a big Great Dane that reminded them of Einstein. “I’m Stefanie the head chief for Big Dog dog-food, and this is Bob our literally biggest mascot for our products.” the little dog said. Bob was a big dog. He looked like he was 40 inches meet from paw to shoulder, and he was incredibly fat. He had double chins, big belly and flabby legs to name just some. He had a fat body very similar to Francis’s. But he had gone for the step further being so big he looks like a blob. “Not a bad size eh?” The Pomeranian said. “Maybe I should give a little backstory? He is not very talkative.” She said looking at the Dane who just gave a blank stare. “It started with that Big dog dog-food had trouble with marketing. We had have TV-commercials where prizewinning beauties eat our dog-food. But those didn’t sell well. When we in the management board where discussing how to make thing better, we got an alarm in food supply. It was Bob. I had no idea where he was from, all that I know about him is his collar that said Bob. He seamed to be homeless and very hungry. So hungry that he had fight through 20 of our security guards just to get to the food. That’s when I got the idea for how to make good marketing. Our TV-commercials that we made was Bob fighting his way through obstacles and other dogs to get to the food, and it had the slogan “Big Dog, worth fighting for.” The commercials became a hit and our selling was successful. As a reward Bob could eat all the dog food he wanted. But after a day of nothing else then eating for Bob we saw what changes our food could do. The food was high on calories and fattening, and was only meant to be eating one portion a day. Bob had just spent the whole day eating all the food he could before he had to sleep. Now the day after we could see that all the dog food had made him obese. We where thinking about how we where going to sell our product when our mascot was a fatty. It has to become a failure right? But to our surprise dogs still wanted our food. They said that still liked Bob because they saw in his eyes that he really loved the food, and that that was the only proof they needed to bye it. So we are still selling well and Bob still gets to eat as much as he wants. He can eat up to almost 30 pounds of dog food a day. Being so tall that he is he now has a weight around 500 pounds. So to celebrate him for saving our company I invited him to this dinner.”

When Francis and Georgette came to where the third pair should be they just saw a Golden retriever girl caring a bowling bag. “Where is your fat partner?” Georgette asked. “Oh, He’s here.” The retriever girl said and opens her bag. Francis and Georgette got a small chock of what they saw. In the bowling bag was a Chihuahua guy how was a ball of fat. Everything except for his head and paws had become so fat that they had consumed the dog. “Hi, my name is Doug and this my girlfriend Ann.” The Chihuahua ball said. “Last time weight myself I was around 200 pounds, with is a lot for a guy my size. I bet you want to know how I became this?” the Chihuahua asked. Francis and Georgette just nodded as an answer. “It started some time ago when I was just a pudgy little Chihuahua compered to how I am now. I used to work on a fabric that made dog food. (If it is the same as the one in the previous story you decide.) I always had a bad habit of eating small portions of the food when nobody saw. One Friday night I had a plan of eating a little from a big food tank. I waited until all the others had gone home, to make sure that nobody would discover me. I leaned over the edge of the tank to try to get some of the food. But I’ll tripped and fell into the tank instead. It felt like I was sinking in quicksand. To make things worse so was there no workers left to help me. There was only one way to save myself…Eat. So for two days straight I did nothing else then eating and eating. So when the others staff return on Monday they found an empty tank and me like this. As you could guess I was fired, and now also immobile. I had to get me a maid to help me with everything at home, since I can’t move anymore. And would you know it? She happens to bee the love of my life.” Doug said giving the word to Ann. “I remember when first meet him. They had said the he was “special” case because of his weight problem. I thought I was going to meet dog like you.” She said looking at Francis. “But when I saw Doug, I couldn’t believe my eyes first. Seeing this little ball with a dog’s head and paw on it was just unbelievable. But then I saw just what cute little eyes he had.” Ann said looking at Doug who blushed a little. “Then after a day of helping him, he and I discovered that we had a lot of thing in common. So he asked me out on a date. And after that date we both knew that we where going to be together in the rest of our lives. I moved in to him so I always can be there and help him. Moving him around all the time has actually been good exercise for me. One thing I’m glad for this dinner is that there is lots of servants how can help Doug so get a chance to just do things myself.”

The last pair that Francis and Georgette meet was a basset couple. (Who reminds them about the Barnyard Dawg from Looney Tunes.) Both of them looked fat. But while the male dog was just having a bit of a potbelly and a double shin, his wife was the real fat one. She had big belly, huge thighs and lots of chin like other fatty’s. But being a female she had fat on some other places to. All the fat had given her huge breasts that have the size DDD. She had even a couple of bottoms matching her breast size. Francis got a little lost in the beautiful female fatty, until Georgette woke him up again. “Hay, My name is Henry and this is my beautiful wife Emily.” Henry said, letting Emily take over. “Ever since I’ve been a little pup, I have always loved to be fat. My biggest wish was to find a man to share the love of fatness. At first I was afraid of asking for man who wants to live with someone fat. But everything feels so easy since I found Henry.” Emily said giving Henry a big kiss. “I actually had a so called “normal” weight before I meet Emily, but now all I want is that we shall be the fattest dog pair in the world.” “We even have plans on getting children, and teach them about the wonders of being fat. And together become the fattest family known to exist.” Emily filled in. “If you are curious Emily weights 280 pounds, and I myself weights 140 pounds. So I got a lot to catch up to.” Henry said giving Emily a kiss back.

After meting all the other guests Francis and Georgette had two things to do. Mingle and Eat. During the entire evening all the pairs was going to be in two groups. The fat one and the partners. That means Francis is only talking and eating with, Frank, Bob, Doug and Emily. And Georgette vice verse with, Linda, Stefanie, Ann and Henry.

What are we going now?

115211222121.content:
Before the dinner Georgette and Francis had some time to get to know the other dog that were there during the mingle. Georgette was a bit unsure at first being that she was a prizewinning, elegant living dog. And most of those how where here is pretty much “peasants” in her eyes.

But there was one dog that stood out for her. A dog that just like her had high grace, and also had a lot of funds to be able to live nicely with. That dog was Stefanie. (The Pomeranian that is the boss for a big dog food company.) She walked to her and decided to talk about the only thing she knew about. Money.

(G=Georgette, S=Stefanie)

G: “So, being the CEO of a big successful dog food business gives a lot of money?”
S: “Yes. Yes it does.”
G: ”Big part of it is Bob right?”
S: “Yes, but things hasn’t been so good lately.”
G: “What do you mean?”
S: “Dogs are starting to complain that the commercials makes it look like our dog food turns whoever eats it into mindless slaves.”
G: “Well, that’s bad.”
S: “ Yes, its certainly bad for business. Having him as the face out has started to make us lose our customers. Without a dog that can give a believable acting for how good our food are I think were doomed.
G: “Well I think I know were to find the dog you need.
S: “And how should that be?”
G: “My husband Francis.”
S: “Francis?”
G: “Yes, He had told me that his dream is to become an actor, and he have been showing me his own made theatre shows a lot of times. I think he´s the one for this role.

What does Stefanie thinks?

During the dinner Georgette thought about all the money they could get if Francis just continued to gain. But think if he didn’t want to do it? “Better keep it discrete.” Georgette thought.

Later at home Georgette…

11521122212221.content:
While Georgette was walking around mingling with the other dogs she got curious about one. Henry. While all she herself and the other partners to the obese dog were pretty “normal sized”, Henry was more “halfway obese”. Georgette walked up to him and asked him why he would want to become like that.

(G=Georgette H=Henry)

G: “Hey Henry, Can I ask you something?”
H: “Sure, was is it?”
G: “Why is it that you want to become as fat as your wife? Not that I disrespect you for doing that. No, no, no. I like to have a very fat lover, just look at Francis. It´s more why let your own body become so much bigger and harder to manoeuvre? ”
H: “First I want to say that I´m glad that you respect my decision, and for second it feel wonderful.”
G: “It does?”
H: “Yes. You know that great feeling you get when you have full body contact with your obese lover?”
G: “Yes?”
H: “Well, imagine having that feeling all the time. To always feel warm and soft where ever you go, and just with your own body have a comfortable pillow to sleep on. Many fat dogs have also said that they feel happy more often.
G: “They do?”
H: “Yes.”
G: “Well thanks Henry. I have to think about that.”
H: “No problems my dear Georgette. Just happy that I can help a dog who is confused.”

As Georgette walked away from Henry he brain started to imagine herself as an big blubbery belching slob.

What does she think about that version of her?

11521122222221.content:
As soon the mingle started Francis walked straight to the very rounded girl Emily. As soon as Francis and Georgette meet the couple with the overweight male and obese female something was trigged inside Francis. He had never felt something like this to a female, and he know that it most be love.

While he was walking to her Francis got a bit unsure what to say. How do you explain your feelings to someone when both you and her already have a partner? “Hay I´m Francis and would you like to leave our partner and run away with me? Nah that wouldn’t work.” Francis thought. “But I can´t either just say nothing when I meet her.”

And before Francis even thought about were in the room he was he saw that he stood in front of Emily. “Oh my god, say something!” Francis thought. “ She is staring at you! At least introduce yourself.”

(F=Francis E=Emily (Thoughts))
