1341.content: Who is going to eat Georgette?
1341.title: Prey

13413.content: Is it Rita that goes and eats Georgette?
13413.title: Rita.

1342.content: When is it taking place?
1342.title: Predator

13422.content:
Georgette had always been the best (At least in her own mind.) pet you could have. She had a beauty and elegance that no other dog or other pet ever could match (At least that what she thought.). So she could not imagine what was going to happen on what seemed like an ordinary day.

The house butler Winston came in to her room and turned on the light at 12:00 noon as usual. She was in need of her “16-hours beauty sleep”. She then had her daily musical number of how “Perfect isn’t easy, but is Me.” Just to show of for the other dogs in the neighbourhood. After putting on makeup and dressed herself with a nice rosette she went down to the kitchen.

When she walk in to the kitchen and saw a little kitten, eating something sloppy and messy that Jenny had made from her finest food bowl. The cat also looked so nonce ant about eating in someone else house. She walked up to the cat who now had realized that someone else had made him company.

Georgette decided to act as “normal” as the cat to a start. “And who do we have here?” Georgette asked so nicely she could, and smiling so the cat could see what sharp teeth’s she has. “O-Oliver.” The cat answered a little nervous at the much larger dog. “Do you know who´s house this is?” Georgette asked grinning a little bigger. “J-Jenny’s?” the cat answered a bit scared of the dog´s constant grinning. “He he Yes,” Georgette said chuckling a little. “But everything that is lower then the kitchen table is my property. That means that the food you’re eating and the bowl is mine!!” Georgette said, getting more and more furious by the word.

Oliver was starting to get really afraid by the blue poodle. He was starting to think that he preferred when she was acting nice. He had two choices of what to do. Eder he could try to run of the house, and perhaps escape this crazy dog. Or he could try to convince her that he been adopted by Jenny as her new pet. Even if the poodle didn’t looked so willing to listen right now.

What shall he do?
13422.title: During the movie.

134222.content:
“Bu-But I-I`m adopted.” Oliver tried to explain being almost to scared to speak. “And who would want a scabby little cat like you?” Georgette asked while starting to circle the cat a little. “J-Jenny.” Oliver answered. “And you think I would believe THAT?!” Georgette said saying the last word up close to him.

When Georgette was doing her rant at Oliver she had been walking around him. When she had come to part were she had her close up to Oliver, so had she placed herself at the other side of him. Oliver had now got the food-bowl at his back when he tried to back away from Georgette when she was getting closer. Oliver stood on his back legs when he tried to lean himself away from the head of Georgette that was getting closer for every word.

She had pace for moving a little bit for every word. So when she pushed her head really close and quickly when she said the last word Oliver lost his balance, and fell into the food-bowl. It was twice as big as Oliver, So it was big enough to be like a mini pool for him. But instead of water to swim in, Oliver was swimming in the food that Jenny had made. To make things worse so had Oliver not have time to eat so much because of Georgettes interruption. He discovered also that the food was dragging him down like quicksand. If he didn’t do anything quickly he would drown in his own food.

All he could do was to start eating for his life. Georgette just stood and watched the little cat struggle. For her this was a win/win situation. Either the cat would be killed by the food, or she would do it.

After what seems like an eternity for Oliver he could finally feel that he had reach the bottom of the bowl and that his head was over the surface. But it wasn’t only his head that was doing that. All that eating had been giving him a big round belly that looked like a big island on this sea of food. He started to feel pains from his stomach of being to full. He started to rub his stomach with his paws when he felt something wet dripping on his stomach from above. Looking up he saw that it was Georgette drooling of the sight of Oliver looking like a stuffed turkey. He realized that she was going to eat him. He also realized that he would have no chance to escape from the bowl. (Being that he was so pinned of his enormous belly, and slippery of all the food he had over his body.)

Was this going to be the end for Oliver?

“Please don’t eat me” Oliver begged. “I taste terrible”. Georgette smiled, and slowly licked his fat stomach. “Mmm, you taste delicious” she said with an evil smile, She was enjoying teasing the cat. She opened her jaws, and prepared to swallow the helpless cat.

Georgette gently slid Oliver’s head into her mouth, she moaned as the delicious taste of cat flooded her mouth. She slowly slid down to Oliver’s fat stomach. Georgette sucked and chewed gently on Oliver’s huge stomach, it was the best thing she had ever tasted, it tasted like chicken smothered in gravy. She lifted her head up to the sky and swallowed the rest of Oliver. She licked her lips, that was the best thing she had ever eaten. She strolled upstairs to her bed and sat down with her digesting stomach, Georgette laughed evilly as she heard Oliver cry for help, but that eventually died down and she fell asleep.

A nod from Georgette made her look into the food-bowl, where she found the very full little cat. “Wow, did you like the food that much?” Jenny asked. Oliver was about to try to tell Jenny what´s happened when she was gone, (How considering that he was a cat hadn’t he thought through.) but saw the treating eyes of Georgette and decided to just nod yes to the question Jenny had asked.

“But just look at you. You are covered in food.” Jenny said and picked Oliver up, noticing also how much he really had eaten. “I think you are in need of 1. A bath. and 2. A good rest.” And she walked out of the kitchen carrying Oliver.

When Georgette became alone she got furious. She was this close to get rid of the intruding cat before Jenny walked in. Looking back at it she started to wonder why she got so exited to eat him when he laid fat and stuffed in a food bowl? Was she actually into stuffing her prays before eating them? “It would ruin my figure if I started eating that.” Georgette thought. “But seeing just how swelled and full that little parasite could get looks so tempting!”

I need to have an adult with me?

Georgette could feel her brain starting to work hard on how to fat Oliver up and then eat him. After a while Georgette had thought up two plans to eliminate Oliver.

1. Stuff Oliver with all the food there was and then eat him when he was filled to his limits. That would be very filling but maybe a bit to fast.

What plan should she use?

After mulling it over for a while she had decided to skip her meals til tomarrow, and then fatten him up with a banquet so she could keep her perfect figure.

The next day Oliver had been sure to remain close to Jenny so he would be safe from Georgette, he had also digested all that food he had eaten yesterday so he was looking much thinner. But when Jenny left he had tried his best to hide from Georgette, but eventually was found under Jenny's covers. Laying there horrified about what would happen next and eventually she said, "Don't worry, I'm sorry about yesterday, I thought you were an intruder lying about being Jenny's pet to get some free stuff." After thinking about it for a minute he decided that what she said made since and believed her (something he would regret later). Afterwords she invited him downstairs for a banquet.

When they entered the kitchen they were greeted by a large feast, filled with the same glop of stuff that Jenny made yesterday, 2 hot dogs, and a salad. "Wow! This is all for us," said Oliver. "Yup, welcome to the sweet life kid," said Georgette. Oliver immediately went to the hotdogs and scarfed one down, "do you want one or can I have the other hotdog," Oliver asked. "Mmm no thanks I'll just have my salad and, special desert you can have everything else you see," she said slightly maniacally. Oliver of course just shrugged this off because 1 he was too naive, 2 he was too exited by the fact that he could have everything but the salad (which he didn't want anyway) and scarfed down the second hot dog and went straight to the messy glop. After she had finished her salad Oliver was about half done with his food and pretty full, "Man am I full," Oliver said. "Oh come now," Georgette said, "you still have half a bowl left you can finish it." "But I'm full," Oliver said. "Now listen here we finish all our food no matter what," Georgette lied. Oliver thinking she wouldn't betray him started eating, meanwhile Georgette snuck up behind him, "Oh come now get on in there." *splash* once again Oliver had fallen in to the large bowl feeling a science of d'j' vu, but this time Georgette had pushed him in. "Hey! What was that for!" "Please just do what you had done yesterday." 1342312.content:
As she thought about a way to get rid of him a disturbing thought entered her head. "He's so much smaller then you that you could eat him."

At first this thought made Georgette gag a little, but the more she thought about it the more it started to sound like the perfect plan. He was small enough to become a decent meal, he seemed to be able to go down almost without chewing, it would not be leaving any traces once he was gone, and to top it all of Georgette started to feel a little hungry herself.

Seeing the small kitten play with some yarn to himself another thought made it into Georgette. "He seems so sweet and innocent that he would probably be easy to trick." It was with this last word that a new plan started to form inside Georgette's head. It sounded too stupid to work at first, but the cat looked so gullible that he might fall for anything.

Georgette started her plan by pretending that she had a horrible pain in her teeth's as she walked up to Oliver. "Ow! Ow! Ow!" she said pretending to be in pain. "What's wrong Georgette?" Oliver asked worried. "I don't know Oliver. I just had a snack and all of suddenly I got this pain in the back of my mouth, like something is stuck there," Georgette said in a fake whine. "Is there anything I can do to help?" Oliver asked really wanting to help. "Well, I can't reach the thing inside with my paws so maybe you can get inside?" Georgette asked. At first Oliver looked like he didn't want to and Georgette thought that this plan wouldn't work, but then he said "I'll do it." and Georgette laughs inside, "This cat doesn't realise how easy he's making it for me." She thought.

"Okay Oliver, I'm lowering my head and you climb inside." Georgette said and open up her mouth wide. With her head low enough Oliver managed to climb inside and started walking on her tongue through the mouth. "I can't believe that he's falling for this!" Georgette thought while keeping still. (She didn't want to eat him directly, but to see just how far she could take this.)

As Oliver walked through the mouth he looked at all the big sharp teeth's that Georgette was sporting but he didn't think anything bad about it. "Georgette is in pain and needs my help, I can't back away just because this looks scary." Oliver thought to himself. As he walked he couldn't seem to find what was causing Georgette this big pain of hers. When he reached the end of Georgette's tongue to where the throat started he stopped. Georgette felt that and wondered if he was going to realise now that this was all a her trap.

Listening closly she heard Oliver say from the inside...
1342312.title: Trick him.

13423121.content:
Georgette answered by trying to say a yes, but having Oliver standing on her tongue made it sound like "yeash".

"Okay, I search further down." Oliver shouted from the inside and started carefully move closer to the hole down to her belly. Georgette just sat there with her mouth still open, wondering if she should just end it now and swallow, but a small voice inside her told her to keep still and see if this will go all the way. As Oliver got closer and closer to falling down the smaller and smaller his steps became. For Georgette this started to become a torture of Oliver teasing her, and making her want to close her mouth and swallow him herself.

But after what was starting to feel like an eternity (for Georgette), Oliver took one step to far and lost balance and fell down. Georgette could feel the little kitten as he went through her troat, and finaly into her belly. She closed her mouth and smiled to herself knowing that she had actually managed to trick Oliver into entering her mouth and go down into her stomach without her actually having to do anything. If someone would ask her if she had forced him in she could honesty say that she hadn't been doing anything.

She could hear from inside Oliver shouting something while he was trying to find a way out from the stomach, but she didn't care what it was, he was eaten and that was all that matters for her.

She walked back into her bedroom and laid down on her bed, wanting to let her little meal get digested properly.

Living with Tito was not a to bad way of living. For Georgette had seen her fair share of men in her life. All kinds of breeds and races had once in her life been there by her side. Blinded by her beauty and willing to do anything for her. That had for many of them cost their lifes.

Their was many rumors of it all going around about what Georgette could have done with them. She enjoyed eating men.

It was something that even she herself couldn't belive some times. She could barley even remember why she had even become this in the first place. But now it was like a huge addiction to her. She enjoyed the taste of them, and even more the part of tricking them into living with her. It was like a big acting role for her, to play the sweet innocent lady that would be in the need of a big strong man to protect her. "But none of them could ever guess that they were the once that needed protection." Georgette though evily to herself.

The only thing that she was still unsure of was if she was going to eat him as he was or if she was going to fatten him up first? Regardless of what it was going to become a whole new experience for her.

135312.content:
Sleeping in his usual sleeping corner Einstein just tried to relax. Being known as a dog with not so many demands, he usually would always find himself doing things for other without any second thoughts. He didn't see anything wrong with helping his fellow friends. They always asked him nicely if he could help them, and afterwards he would always be thanked by them for helping them out. Everybody he knew always had this nice attitude towards him...well almost everybody.

There was one in the group who would, (just because Einstein was a bit slow) treat him like an idiot. And that one was TIto. The little chihuahua had some nerves always yelling for Einstein to help him with something. He never asked nicely, and never thanked him afterwards. And being that he was the smallest one in the group meant that he needed help more then everyone else. It could be anything from reaching up to something, to move something that was blocking his way. And almost every time he would go and force Einstein to do it beacuse he was so easy to convince. Einstein himself found it some what irritating that Tito never could ask nicely, but he didn't say anything becuase he didn't like to hold on arguments that wouldn't lead to anything. But for every time Tito came and forced him to help him Einstein could feel a clear feeling of rage growing within him.

And on this very moment Einstein had previously been helping Dodger and Rita with big things like holding up a garbage container lid while Dodger and Rita searched through it, and then carrying several big and heavy garbage bags on his back all the way back to the boathouse. Dodger and Rita had asked him during the walk back if he would like to have them carrying some of the bags for him. He had told them that it wouldn't be necessary, since he was so very strong (Actually it was because he was so kindhearted that he wouldn't let them have to put on so much pain just for his sake.). When he finally came back home he was completely exhausted, and nothing would be more realxing then to lay down and strech out his worn out body. Getting himself comfortable and tossing his own blanket over him, Einstein was feeling ready for some sleep.

But right on queue the little Chihuahua walked right up to his sleepy head and started shouting orders. "Hey YOU! What are you doing laying down sleeping in the middle of the day?! I need you to help me reach the remote!!!" "Please, can't it wait? Can't you just ask someone else to help you?" Einstein asked with a bit of irritation in his voice. "NO! I'm asking you, so you help me!" Tito said, stomping his little paws into the floor with great force. "Please, I have been doing some really hard and exhausting" work today. My body is feeling really weak right now, and i would like you to ask someone else from the gang to help you with you're problem." Einstein asked in a bit more demaning voice now. Tito simply took this as an insult and walked away, mumbling loudly about "how much of a weakling Einstein is".

This was the last straw for Einstein. He had always been there helping Tito. No matter how simple or stupid the task asked was he would always do it without any complains, and everything he would get back from Tito would be more and more scolding on him. Never had that little irritation ever showed him some love and respect. Not even at his own birthday party. He remembers it so well. He had been given for a birthdya treat a big nice juciy bone that Faggin had found in a trashcan behind a butchershop, and even then the little pipsqueak had told him that he was going to share half of it with him, because "that is the right thing to do".

The right thing to do. "That little manpup doesn't even know what the word rigth even means!!" Einstein thought angerly to himself. He was super furoius now. He wouldn't be able to go to sleep before teaching that small dog some manners. "Sharing half the bone with you! That bone was probably twice as big as you..." His belly gave away a sound of hunger indicating that all the days hard work had left him pretty empty, and thinking back to that big bone didn't make things better. That's when his brain got a nasty thought. The anger towards the small chihuahua mixed with the hunger of having done hard work all day formed a very sinister plan in his head. "Why not solve both problems?" His brain thought. "The only question is, when to do it?"

13532122.content:
A lonely german shepherd makes his way through the alleys, carefully he looks around as if to not be seen. Wearing a beige collar he showed that he was owned by someone, but still he seemed to be in some kind of debt that not even his owner would be able to protect him from, and was forcing him to run around alleys at nigh.

Once he reached the place he was told to meet in he looks around seeing nothing but the tall dark wllas of building, towering over him and almost blocking the moon. All of the sudden he could feel how a arm reached out from one of the walls and grabbed him by the collar. Getting up in eye level he saw that what he had believed was one of the house wallls, was instead one of the two dobermans he had been in dept to.

His plan before had been to get to them, tell them at a safe distance that he couldn't pay them, and then run of. Now he found himself caught in one of these monsters of dogs grips instead. He had before only heard rumors about the size of them, but that was nowhere near how big they where in real life. Hanging of his feet he could compair and see that the height of them was about three times his own lenght, and they looked like they weight about the same as thirty dogs like him.

Looking at the red collar the creature was wearing he guessed he was the one that goes by the name Roscoe. "Oh, How nice to see you here, I hope you brought a lot of food to us, since we are both starving." He said in a diabolical way, almost sounding like he would he him instead. "W-Well the thing is..." The german shepherd started to say, looking up into Roscoe's face he could see that the doberman was already knowing what he was going to say. "Go on." He said in a deep anger voice. "I-I have been giving you both food for the next month or so, and I think my master is starting to find out, and the situation is soo bad that he has and I'm not kidding here, been puting on a lock to the fridge. It is only he and I living together so he knows I'm the on taking food at night. I just don't know what to do in that kind of situation..." He stopped talking as he could see that Roscoe wasn't buying his excuses at all.

"Well, we seems to have a problem here. You are telling us that you can't fix any food for us, and here Desoto and I are starving. What are we going to do about that?" Roscoe said and looked back at his partner in crime. Desoto didn't answer as his stomach spoke for itself, and he himself leaned towards the german shepherd grinning his teeths at him.

"Since you can't fix any food for us...You have to become the food!" Roscoe said dramatically, and saw how the panic in the smaller dog's eyes was showing. As he heard his own gigant stomach growl Roscoe takes another look at the poor dog before saying. "I'm going to be really nice to you now and ask you which of us two you would rather become food for. You can choose either one of us and get swallowed whole, or you will be torned in half as food for us both whichs will be really painfull on your path. So who of us are you going to choose?" Roscoe asked the dog, who was thinking sadly for a moment before deciding...

135331.content: What about the lion king?
135331.title: Choices for a vore crossover

1353311.content: And what lion king will travel to the world of Oliver and company and have a feast?
1353311.title: The lion king

13533111.content:
Simba’s eyes slowly fluttered open as he awoke from a deep sleep, he didn’t even remember going to bed in the first place. “Wait, where am I?” the little cub asked himself as he looked around, he definitely wasn’t at home, that was for sure.

What Simba didn’t know was that he was in a house boat, how he got there was anybody’s guess but that wasn’t important right now. He was cold, hungry and far away from any of his family.

The lion lifted his nose to the air and sniffed, the air was filled with unfamiliar yet strangely pleasant scents. This strange place appeared to be home to several animals, although he didn’t know what kind, and they smelt delicious. “I might as well have a little snack while I’m here...” Simba smiled, his inner predator starting to creep out. He was scared as well, being in an unfamiliar place far away from home, and maybe a hunt would clear his mind.

His little ears moved around as he heard a little voice calling out “hello, is anybody there?” a quick sniff told him that creature was edible, Simba licked his lips and went to meet his new friend.

Who is it?
13533111.title: Simba and Company

135331111.content:
Simba rounded the corner and was disappointed to find that his dinner was small and scrawny, this creature was more of an appetiser for the hungry cub, but food was food. “Hey” he shouted at the little animal “what are you doing here?”

The cat, whose name was Oliver, jumped with shock and quickly spun around to face the intruder, the first thing he noticed was how much bigger this creature was than him and how sharp his teeth were. “I live here, and you’re trespassing” he said, trying to make himself look big and threatening, which only succeeded in making Simba even hungrier. “I just woke up” the lion said “I don’t know how I got here or how to get home.” The cat felt a stab of guilt as he looked at the sad animal in front of him, “Maybe I could help.”

“I’m actually sort of hungry” Simba said as he advanced on Oliver, the cat’s tasty scent tickling his nose. “I could get you some food if you want” Oliver responded, becoming a little uncomfortable around the big cat “What do you eat?”

Simba thought for a moment, deciding whether he should tell the truth or not. "If I lie, he might bring me to his friends" Simba said to himself, his stomach rumbling hungrily.
135331111.title: Lion meets cat

choices: Simba uses him as bait to draw the others out
1353311111.content:
Simba moved close to Oliver’s ear and whispered “little animals usually…” The lion laughed to himself as the cat’s eyes widened with fear, this was so much fun.

“y-you don’t eat…cats do you?” Oliver asked, backing away as he realised that the animal could swallow him whole if he wanted to. Simba, assuming this animal was a cat, smiled a wide smile and said “never had one, but I’m always up for trying new food.”

The lion moved further towards the terrified cat, backing him into a corner to prevent his escape, all the while sniffing and sizing his meal up. “You smell good” he smiled “like a little, furry Meerkat.”

Oliver had no idea what a Meerkat was, and he had a feeling that smelling nice wasn’t a good thing in this situation, but the creature’s hungry eyes told him everything he needed to know. This animal saw him only as a snack, and the gang wasn’t around to save him this time, but the predator didn’t know that!

“I have a gang” Oliver said, getting more confident “if you hurt me they’ll find out, and then you’ll be sorry.” Simba stopped and thought for a moment before saying “then I’ll eat them as well.”

The cat couldn’t believe his ears, he’d never heard anybody talk about eating dodger or the gang, especially considering this creature was smaller than most of them. “You won’t be saying that when you meet them” he hissed “now please leave.”
1353311111.title: Being Honest

13533111111.content:
“Actually, I think I’ll stay for a while” Simba smiled and pounced on the cat, trapping him under his thick front paws. “No wait!” Oliver pleaded as the long tongue came out and licked him, the lion loudly smacking his lips as he spread the little cat’s taste around his mouth. “Mmm, delicious” Simba purred, nibbling lightly on Oliver’s head as he continued struggling.

“You don’t need to eat me” He tried begging, saliva seeping into his eyes, “I’m sure there’s other good food out there.” The lion rolled his eyes and growled “you’re starting to annoy me; I think it’s time to eat…”

The cat started struggling wildly as Simba opened his jaws wide, showing Oliver his eagerly pulsating throat, and engulfed his head. Instantly the cat’s delicious flavour spread throughout his mouth as his cheeks puffed out, filled with juicy meat. “mmmm” the lion purred, shaking his jaws from side to side like he’d seen his Father do with zebras, before jerking his jaws forward and packing more of the cat’s meat into his thick jaws.

Inside the mouth, Oliver wiped the saliva from his eyes as the lion swallowed again, pulling him further towards his demise. He could smell hot breath pushing past him, smelling like the meat that Simba was used to eating, he couldn’t detect any cat in there but that would soon change. “Please let me go!” He shouted, barely audible over the sick sucking and smacking sounds that surrounded him, at least the lion wasn’t munching on him. It was a sickening experience for the little cat, surrounded by the moist flesh of the lion’s maw and the sickening sounds of him purring,

Simba on the other hand, couldn’t have been happier with his little snack. The cat was surprisingly delicious and just small enough to bolt down with no hassle, which was perfect for the hungry lion. He’d never really enjoyed tearing his prey apart, it was more fun to swallow them alive and feel them waste away inside of him.

But as much fun as he was having, Simba’s hunger still needed to be sated and it was almost time to finish. All that was left of the cat now was two frantically wriggling hind legs and a stubby tail sticking out of the cub’s jaws. Simba’s tongue flicked out again and rolled over the juicy paws, tasting them one last time, before he swallowed once more and sent the cat down to his waiting belly.

Oliver’s face lit up for a moment as the lion prepared himself for the final swallow, he was being let go! But this relief only lasted for a moment as the jaws jerked forward once more and he was pulled down the predator’s throat, the oesophagus walls trying to push in on him and make him easier to digest. But Oliver was too big a package for the walls to completely crush; instead he was pulled down whole and alive.

After Oliver landed in the belly, Simba rolled on his back and rubbed the bulge in his stomach where the cat lay, already stewing in digestive juices. “You might as well stop fighting” the lion said “it isn’t going to do you any good.”

But the cat didn’t listen and continued to struggle, the digestive acid already burning his skin and the stomach walls contracting around him. “Please” he shouted “let me out!” but the lion didn’t respond, all Oliver could hear was the bubbling and gurgling of the stomach as he passed out.

Feeling his meals struggles come to a stop, the lion belched and sat back up, but just as he did he heard a voice shout out:

“You better have a good reason for being here, and you better tell me where my little friend is before I get mad.”

Who is it?
13533111111.title: It's a cat eat cat world

135331111111.content:
Simba craned his head around and to see the talking creature, it didn’t look anything like the cat but a quick sniff told him it was just as edible. “I was just in the neighbourhood and thought I might come in and have a little snack” the lion said as he got back up “and your friend was delicious.”

“You spit him out right now!” the creature, whose name was dodger, shouted. “I don’t think I will” Simba responded and belched loudly “But don’t worry, you and the rest of your friends will be joining him soon.”

Dodger backed away as the predator got up and started walking towards him, drool leaking out of its mouth. “Stay back" he warned, baring his teeth, but the Animal in front ignored him and continued moving closer.

What happens next?
135331111111.title: Dodger to the rescue

1353311111112.content:
"I swear if you take one more step..." Dodger said angrily, before Simba took just one more step with great force. "You where saying?" Simba asked cocky. This was the final straw for Dodger that decided to go to attack. "Oliver or no Oliver that little hairball will pay!" Dodger thought as he took of.

Simba started as well run towards his opponent (Despite his new well filled belly gave him some resistance), but eating that small kitten must have made him get a case of megalomania, since he might have gone into something to big even for him to handle this time. And that proved to be true that even though he managed to defeat Oliver he was still just a lion cub, and Dodger was a full grown dog. He looked to have enough room in his stomach to take both Simba and Oliver if he wants to, and that seemed to be a scenario about to happen very soon.

When they both collided into each other it only took one second before Dodger got Simba pinned on his back, and Simba realized first then that he might have done the wrong choice here. "He, he ,heh...I'm sorry?" Simba asked pleading for his life. "To late." Dodger only answered before shoving the lion cub's head into his mouth. With both Dodger's paws and his own stomach keeping him down there was nothing Simba could do to break himself free. He was completely trapped in his place, while Dodger took his time enjoying it.

After tasting enough of Simba's face Doger decided to further and swallowed Simba up to his waist. He had now the Oliver filled belly inside his mouth, and he could swear that he felt it jiggle a little on it's own when his tounge was touching it. "Probably must be Oliver trying to get out, and now I'm only putting him in an even harder prison to escape." Dodger sadly thought as he swallowed yet again. With the big bulge of the stomach in his throat Dodger knew he had to finish quickly if he didn't want to choke to death, and with that he even sent Simba's feet and tail down as well.

Looking down the dog saw that he too now was sporting a belly that was bulging out nicely, and inside it was a spoiled little lion prince sitting trapped for what he had done, and sadly also his friend Oliver to. Really wishing he could save Oliver Dodger got an idea. It wasn't a good one, but still better then standing around doing nothing. "Hey you inside!" He shouted at his stomach, but didn't get any answer. He knew that he had just recently swallowed the lion cub, so he would still have plenty of air inside so he tried again. "I know you can't go anywhere else so answer!" He said just as loudly as last time, and this time he got an answer. "What?" It sounded very muffled but Dodger could still make it out. "You still have my friend inside of you right?" He asked. "Yes." The cub answered from inside, sounding very annoyed over the dog talking to him when he was about to get digested. "And he's still alive?" "Pretty much." Simba answered after feeling his own stomach for a moment. "Then I have a deal I would like to give you." Dodger said to him. "And what's that?" Simba asked, sounding a bit interested over where this was going. "I am prepared to spare your life, if you yourself takes and spares my friend's." Dodger said. "And if I don't want to?" Simba asked, still sounding like he was the one on top here. "Then you will both die here." Dodger said and gave his stomach a pat with his paw, sending Simba (and possible Oliver) shaking around inside. "Have I made myself clear?" Dodger asked, while stopping his stomach from shaking anymore. "Yes! Yes!" Simba shouted from the inside, starting to feel sick from the ride. "Good. Oh, and one more thing." Dodger said. "Sigh" "What?" Simba asked, feeling he wasn't going to get out of this easy. "I want you to throw up your little meal before I throw up you." Dodger said, and then added. "And don't think about cheating. My stomach can easily feel when there is two living things inside me."

"So what will it be?" Dodger asked Simba sitting inside of him.
1353311111112.title: Simba bites of more then he can chew.

13533111111121.content:
"Okay, I agree" Simba says as he pushes on his lower abdomen underneath Oliver and begins the process of hurling Oliver from his stomach. Simba coughs and lurches, feeling the large lump that is Oliver begin to force its way upward from his stomach, entering the lower esophagus and travel slowly but surely upwards through Simba's forceful hacking and lurching and pushing.

Soon enough, Simba feels Oliver at the back of his throat and with an almighty shove from his paws pressing into his stomach, Simba forces Oliver out of his throat, onto his tongue and out of his mouth. Oliver begins to hack and cough from the rough treatment. Simba sees Oliver and notices that his fur is slightly burned off in places.

Oliver looks around, seeing nothing but darkness but feeling Simba behind him. Oliver turns to Simba and asks, Where are we?"

"We're in a dogs stomach." Simba replies.

"Do you know which one?" Oliver asks.

"All I saw was that he was White and Brown with a handkerchief around his neck. " Simba said describing Dodger.

"That's Dodger." Oliver says excited.

Meanwhile, Dodger feels the addition of a second entity in his stomach and licks his lips and rubs his distended stomach, feeling them move around inside him. "Do you guys want to be let out now?" Dodger asks them.

"Yes." Simba and Oliver yell out.

"Well..."Dodger says.

Does Dodger keep his promise?
13533111111121.title: Simba agrees.

13533121.title: Yes. Jungle Book.

choices: he picks them off one by one
he jumps on them all at once
135331211.content:
Bagheera stalked through the forest, his soft panther paws barely making a sound on the forest floor as he searched s for something nice and tasty to eat. He poked his nose in the air and took in a deep sniff, “just rabbits and monkeys” he thought, a little disappointed at the lack of variety on the menu. “Just once I’d like something a little more exotic” Bagheera said to himself.

---

As the panther continued his hunt, a strange new group of animals had entered the forest, a little girl and her assortment of dogs, and one little kitten named Oliver. Jenny was participating in a new reality TV show which saw a number of young pet owners stay in the jungle with their animals, although she couldn’t see why anybody would watch such a show Jenny had always wanted to visit the jungle, and do so with her pets was a dream come true.

Unfortunately, the little girl was never great at following directions and wasn’t able to find were she was supposed to meet the television crew. “Um guys” she said turning to her pets “I think we’re lost.” Georgette, who had been forced to tag along, look aghast “lost?” she spluttered “do you know how many savage beasts live in the forest?”

And as it turned out one savage beast had just caught the scent of the group, Bagheera. “wow, that smells good” the hungry panther thought “I wouldn’t eat the human, but those other animals certainly smell tasty.”

And with that he began walking towards the place where the scents were originating from…
135331211.title: Bagheera

choices: he goes after Dodger and Oliver
1353312111.content:
Looking through the bushes, the panther hungry could see the little human and her assortment of pets. He licked his chops vigorously at the sight. “Not exactly a noble meal” thought Bagheera “but at least it’s a filling one.”

“now which one will I go for first?” he said to himself, eyeing up a little kitten that was clinging to the ears of the brown and white dog, cannibalism wasn’t exactly Bagheera’s cup of tea but he was pretty hungry…

The brown and white dog in question was dodger, and the cat hanging on to his ears was a very scared Oliver, who was getting progressively more scared as he thought of Georgette’s comment. “P-predators?” he whispered “I don’t wanna be eaten!” Dodger stopped and started reassuring the cat, “it’s okay” he said “as long as we stick together nothing can hurt us.”

But as he turned back around to continue walking, Dodger realised that the other pets had walked on without them. “They can’t have gone far” he said, getting a little scared himself, and began walking down the nearest path.

Bagheera, still hidden away, couldn’t believe his luck. “All alone, how perfect.”
1353312111.title: he picks them off one by one

13533121111.content:
Dodger and Oliver continued walking through the forest, sniffing around for any sign of jenny or the others. Bagheera followed closely behind them, moving from bush to bush silently, before eventually calling out “what’s wrong young ones, lost?”

Dodger quickly jumped around, baring his teeth and almost throwing Oliver off his back. “Who’s there?” he growled, the spark of bravery dying in his throat as Bagheera walked out slowly, smiling widely and looking vicious in the forest light.

“Just a hungry panther” said Bagheera as he moved close to the two animals, their tantalising scents making his stomach beg for them. The two friends shivered, staring silently as the panther walked around, licking his lips as he did. Finally the dog worked up the courage to speak, “p-please Mr Panther” he stammered “maybe we can make a deal.”

Suddenly Bagheera had an idea, a most evil idea at that “okay then, we’ll make a deal.” Both of the pets looked up, hopeful that it would be fair.
“You give me that cat on your back, and I’ll let you go.” The panther said to dodger, reveling in the shocked expression from both the animals. “w-what will you do with him if I do?” Dodger asked, Bagheera licked his lips for dramatic effect and said “I’ll eat him, whole and alive, but you can go free.”

“You can’t let him Dodger!” Oliver squealed, terrified at the very notion of being given up to this ferocious beast. Usually the dog would have refused the offer straight out, but he couldn’t fight this panther, and either way Oliver would end up on the menu…but this was his friend, he couldn’t just feed him to a hungry beast.

“Alright” he said after a few silent moments “I’ve made my decision.”
13533121111.title: The panther's deal

choices: Teaches Dodger how to be a predator
135331211111.content:
“As long as you don’t eat me, you can have Oliver” Dodger finally said, feeling the cat’s claws instantly dig into him as he did. “You can’t let him eat me!” Oliver shouted as the panther advanced, licking its lips slowly and making it very clear that it was going to enjoy eating him. “Sorry Oliver, it’s for the best” the dog said with a surprising amount of relish, almost as if he wanted to see Bagheera eat the cat…

“You’re crazy, I’m getting out of her!” Oliver said but before he could run the panther bounded over and gently placed its jaws over his little body, taking the cat off Dodger’s back and proudly showing him off like the piece of meat he was. “Let go of m-” Oliver tried to say before Bagheera sucked him inside the jaws, never to let him out again.

The panther sloshed the little kitten around his predatory jaws, sucking on him like a piece of candy and gently chewing his soft body. Oliver had a surprisingly good bit of meat on him, which was probably thanks to jenny overfeeding him, and tasted delicious. Dodger looked on as Bagheera ate his friend, but instead of fear or disgust he had a certain look of curiosity, the panther could even swear that he saw the dog lick his own lips as he watched the spectacle in front of him.

Oliver screamed inside as he was sloshed around the moist predatory jaws, the smell of the panther’s hot breath making him gag. It was clear that he wasn’t the first creature that the beast had eaten, and probably wouldn’t be the last. “Please let me go!” he shouted over the sickening sounds of Bagheera purring and smacking his lips, but he knew it was pointless.

The panther, deciding that he’d tortured the little kitten enough, quickly gulped him down whole and alive. He lifted a black paw and felt the little wriggling bulge Oliver made in his neck as he travelled down the tight throat, whimpering and meowing all the way down.

When Oliver settled in his belly Bagheera smacked his lips loudly for the last remnants of flavour and looked back at Dodger, who was actually smiling at this point. “wow, that was…actually sort of interesting” the dog exclaimed, not realising that the panther could still very well eat him.

What does Bagheera do?
135331211111.title: he gives up Oliver

Oliver the cat awoke one fateful morning with a very uncomfortable feeling in his stomach, as it felt like something straight out of a nightmare itself. Upon stumbling over to a mirror he looked at himself and very instantly realized what had happened to him.

He turned into a very big fat orange colored dog.

It was the cold hard truth. His teeth were now much more sharper, his fur was shaggy and orange and his stubby tail had been replaced by a very big fat dog tail.

"Why me?" he dejectedly asked himself, maybe it was something he ate or maybe it was something else, but that didn't matter right now. What did matter was what he was going to do next.

Then at that moment...

1421.content:
The impossible and unthinkable had happened, as Dodger who was at first normal sized suddenly transformed into a giant towering blob of a dog who couldn't believe what was happening at that moment.

Dodger: Hooo boy, this can't be good, since i'm now a giant towering blob of a dog, what's Rita gonna think of me if she sees yours truly? After all i gotta do something but what?

Then Dodger had an idea and his idea was to....
1421.title: Gets suddenly turned into a blob.

1423.content: What else can he turn into?
1423.title: Other Transformations

14231.content:
Dodger awoke in the middle of the night with an uncomfortable feeling in his stomach, like something had gone horribly wrong. Stumbling over to a mirror he looked at himself and realised instantly what had happened.

He’d turned into a wolf overnight.

There was no doubt it. His teeth were sharper, his fur was shaggy and grey and his stubby tail had been replaced by a flowing brush. “How did this happen?” he asked himself, maybe it was that strange dog that bit him the other day or maybe it was the food he had eaten, but the cause of his transformation didn’t matter right now. What did matter was what he was going to do next.

Then...
14231.title: A Wolf

142311.content:
As Dodger was looking at his new body, Oliver had woken up and walked in on him. “w-what are you doing here?” the cat stammered, trying to look scary but not succeeding. The fearsome wolf turned around to look at him, and spoke with the voice of his friend.

“Its okay kitty cat” the wolf said “it’s me, Dodger.” Oliver couldn’t believe his ears or eyes, the fearsome creature standing in front of him was actually his friend. “What happened to you?” he asked.

“I don’t know, I just woke up like this” Dodger responded, his belly rumbling lightly as he looked at the little cat. He normally wouldn’t have thought about eating Oliver, but his wolfish instincts were starting to kick in and his little friend looked tasty.

What happens next?
142311.title: Temptation

1423111.content:
Dodger walked closer to the cat, who was still shooting questions at him, and licked his lips. He usually didn’t eat cats because of the fur, but if he swallowed Oliver whole his strong wolf stomach would take care of the fur for him.

“I was actually kind of scared when I first saw you, I thought you were gonna eat me!” the cat exclaimed, making the wolf smile. “well, I am kind of hungry…” he said before picking up Oliver in his jaws and placing him on his bed, away from prying eyes.

“heh, you’re starting to scare me a l-little” stammered Oliver as he wiped the wolf’s saliva from his fur. “You should be scared” Dodger said, smiling deviously “I wasn’t joking.”

The wolf quickly opened his jaws, giving Oliver a good view of his throat pulsating greedily, and spread them over his little head. “mmmm” he said, tasting the delicious cat meat, “I really should of tried this sooner.” The feline’s flavour was slightly mild but had a certain tang to it that the wolf loved, making him growl in pleasure as he scoffed more of Oliver down his greedy throat.

Inside the mouth, Oliver wiped the saliva from his eyes as the wolf swallowed again, pulling him further towards his demise. “Dodger wait!” he tried to say, barely audible over the growling and sucking sounds, but the wolf didn’t respond. All Oliver could do was look on in terror as he was pulled further towards the throat, the sharp teeth pushing into his soft skin as he did.

Dodger stopped for a moment to listen to the scared cat’s begging and whimpering, he had to laugh at how pathetic and futile it was. As if he was actually going to let the delicious cat go free.

But as much fun as he was having, Dodger’s needed to finish before someone else came in. He flicked his tongue out one last time to taste his prey’s wriggling feet before jerking his jaws forward again and sending the cat down to his waiting belly.

Dodger patted his stomach, filled with the delicious cat wriggling feebly inside, and licked his lips for the last remnants of Oliver’s flavour. “Fight all you want, you aren’t getting out anytime soon” he laughed.

What happens next?
1423111.title: A wolf's snack

14231112.content:
As he was heading back to his sleep corner he could feel how his stomach was already working hard on digesting his cat meal, and before he even know he could hear his stomach shouting for food again.

"What is this?" He thought to himself. "This new wolf body must have been doing some strange changers to my insides as well."

"It seems that there is nothing of Oliver left anymore." Dodger thought as he felt his soft middle, that seemed to have a small amount of fat taking up where Oliver previously was. "Looks like my body is able to take care of the food much quicker then before, and get hungry again unfortunately." Hearing his stomach growl once again made it even more clear that he needed to eat something more if he wanted to go back to sleep without an empty stomach.

"But what will I eat now?" He thought. "I ate Oliver because of his small size, except for Tito no one else will be able to fit inside. Or will they?" Remembering back to when he ate Oliver he had felt his jaws being a bit looser when they open up. Given all the other changes he had seen this seemed pretty possible work.

"But who should I eat?" Dodger thought as he felt his was starting to get hungry for real.

He decides to eat...
14231112.title: Hungry for one more.

142311121.content:
Yes…the little Chihuahua would be a perfect snack for the new, ferocious predator. Dodger could easily swallow Tito whole without anyone noticing, and then he could move on to the bigger meals. The wolf snickered at the pure deliciousness of the situation and went off to find his little friend, or little snack as he would soon become.

But where was Tito?
142311121.title: Tito.

choices: No, he goes straight for Tito
1423111212.content:
Tito was staying at his Georgette’s house that night, which was just perfect for Dodger. “More food for me” he smiled and quickly snuck out of the houseboat, trying not to wake anybody in the process. Dodger was tempted to spend a bit more time feasting on Rita and the others, but that could wait. Right now he was on the prowl for Tito and his poodle girlfriend.

Since it was night-time the hungry wolf had no trouble sneaking around the alleyways of New York, getting into the house itself proved to be more problematic. “There has to be a way in” Dodger thought, the tantalising smells inside driving him insane. Luckily for him, Jenny had left a window open around the back. “Perfect” the wolf smiled and squeezed himself through the small passageway, almost getting stuck thanks to his enlarged stomach.

He dropped into the kitchen and sniffed around, his heightened senses told him that Tito was upstairs, sleeping and unaware of what was about to happen. But as Dodger prepared to go upstairs he smelt something just as tasty…human food.

The kitchen was full of chocolate, meat, fruit and lots of other delicious food. “I suppose they wouldn’t mind if I had a bite to eat” Dodger chuckled.
Does he gorge himself?
1423111212.title: at Georgette's house

14231112122.content:
“No, I’ll have enough food to keep me going” the wolf smiled, almost salivating at the thought of the feast that lay before him. He left the kitchen and slowly snuck up the stairs, taking care not to wake any of the humans. If he remembered correctly Jenny was completely on her own for the week. Her parents had gone away on a business trip and Winston was on his holidays, so now she was alone with two dogs and a hungry wolf.

Dodger put his nose in the air and sniffed deeply, following the tasty scents to where Tito and Georgette slept. He silently nudged the door open, it was dark inside but thanks to his heightened senses Dodger could see almost everything in the room, including his little Chihuahua snack. He looked over at Georgette, who was wearing earmuffs to help her sleep and wouldn’t be able to hear Dodger eat her boyfriend. Everything was working out perfectly for the wolf, now all that was left was to start feasting.

He moved towards Tito, the tiny dog looking and smelling delicious as he slept.. Dodger salivated as he looked at his little snack, a small droplet of drool dribbled down his cheek and splashed onto the Chihuahua’s face. “Damn it” Dodger thought as Tito started to stir “guess it’s time to eat.”

“wh-“ Tito tried to say but was interrupted as Dodger opened his jaws and quickly enveloped his tiny head. The Chihuahua instantly started squealing and struggling but Georgette couldn’t hear him through the earmuffs, leaving Dodger to swallow the dog in peace.

Tito had a much more raw and beefy taste than Oliver did, he also had less fur which was just fine for Dodger. He also fought a lot harder, kicking his tiny feet as he hung from the wolf’s jaws, not that it did much good. “mmmm” Dodger growled as he sucked and gnawed on Tito, enjoying every single bit of his little form.

Seeing Georgette start to stir awake, Dodger quickly gulped his little meal down, feeling him struggle and whine all the way down to his wolf stomach. A stomach which made quick work of the Chihuahua, digesting him in a matter of moments and leaving Dodger to focus on the poodle awaking in front of him.
“Who’s there?” Georgette asked, struggling to see in the darkened room. Dodger quickly moved towards the poodle, preparing to swallow her whole.
14231112122.title: Little Snack

142311121221.content:
“Nice to see you again darling” Dodger drawled as Georgette jumped up in fright, her eyes adjusting to the light and finally letting her see the ferocious animal. “Dodger…is that you?” she asked, eyeing his sharp teeth while her sensitive nose picked up his smelly wolf breath. “sure is, I’ve went a got me a new body” the predator responded “and I hope you don’t’ mind, but I had a little snack when I came in her-URP” he belched right into Georgette’s terrified face, giving her a good whiff of the “little snack” he’d just eaten.

“You ate Tito?” she screamed in horror, the smell of digesting Chihuahua all around her. “Yep, and Oliver, and soon Jenny…I’m looking forward to eating her” he whispered with relish “but first, I think I’ll eat you…”

And with that he quickly opened his mouth wide and took in the poodle’s long muzzle, causing her to start trashing wildly and squealing a little. “Let go” she mumbled, her mouth held shut by Dodger’s strong wolf jaws as he took a moment to taste her. “not a chance” the wolf replied, himself muffled by all the meat in his mouth.

Deciding that he’d enough of her protests, Dodger gulped again; bringing Georgette in up to her neck. “She sure does taste good” the wolf thought to himself, growling and murring with pleasure as his meal trashed within. Georgette had a natural flavour of dog that Dodger has only today discovered a taste for, but she also had a slightly rich undertone to her taste which was probably due to her diet.

Georgette wasn’t enjoying the trip nearly as much as Dodger was judging from how much she was kicking and screaming. “Stop, I’ll do anything!” she shouted, her voice barely audible over the growling and sick sucking sounds of the wolf’s jaws, not that he was listening to her anyway.

Dodger quickly gulped through his meal, eventually arriving at the poodle’s long hind legs and sucking in her little furry tail. “Well it’s been fun, but I should really be getting too little Jenny…” he thought to himself and quickly swallowed down Georgette’s slender legs, licking over her little feet before gulping them down as well.

The wolf fell on his back, his belly bigger than it had ever been before, and growled loudly with pleasure. “Mmmm, delicious” he said as the poodle inside began kicking the stomach walls in a futile escape attempt. But within minutes she too had succumbed to Dodger’s strong wolf stomach, although he’d still be working off the fat she’d give him for weeks.

“but now it’s time to move onto the main course” Dodger thought “little Jenny.”
142311121221.title: Rich food

info.description:
An interactive story with the animal characters in Disney's Oliver and Company.

Give the cat or one the dogs a Weight gain, Inflation, vore (Soft) or Transformation story.

You can have human characters getting gained or inflated, but try to keep focus on the animal characters.

No Gore and/or Scat please.

Don't forget to rate and review. And I would like if you could make the chapters long.

And don't forget to have fun!
